story:
Today we are launching a supplemental project requested by many of our Roslof Keep fans.  This will be a refection of the tri-fold DM screen that we produced for the original Roslof Keep Campaign, but this time you'll have it for The Curse of Roslof Keep.  I hope all of you who have enjoyed Roslof over the past five years will round out this campaign with this great DMs helper, as it will again hold secrets only the DM will need ready access to.

 

This beautiful tri-fold DM screen will help any Roslof DM navigate both the mega-dungeon, but also the area above, including detailed charts for city encounters in the Kasbah of Tiefon.  

The screen will come shrink wrapped (like all Folio adventures), and for further reference as to what is included in a Folio adventure, see below.

story:
Who Are Vanguard Miniatures?

Vanguard Miniatures is an established wargames company with its own range of metal and resin miniatures, as well as plastic bases.

In order to ensure this campaign runs smoothly, Vanguard are teaming up with collaborators Troublemaker Games to help run this campaign, as having run five successful Indiegogo Crowdfunders they're pretty good at knowing how this button-pushing bippety-boopety computers lark is supposed to work.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our 6mm scale models in this funding campaign are intended to reinforce our Defeat In Detail range of models, by adding more models to the existing ranges.


As we cross stretch goals, we'll be unlocking more models, some of which can be seen in silhouette below...

We have many designs already sculpted, and without a crowdfunding campaign it would be another year or even two before we could afford to put them all into production, so your interest and support at this stage means we can put out more metal models at a much faster rate than would otherwise be possible.

The Models

All of the models in this campaign are to be METAL models, unless otherwise stated.

Most of the models have already been Matter Printed and are awaiting a trip to the casting foundry, whilst other models only exist as-yet in CAD form - your support now will ensure they become real tiny toy fighty models!

 

 

Novan Elites Pathfinders

Novan Elites Pathfinders are highly trained and equipped with the very best armaments and reconnaissance assets.

Each set of Novan Elites Pathfinders contains:

4 x Sprue A

4 x Sprue B

 

Novan Elites Sparta

The Sparta is a light APC, used by the Elite Pathfinders.

Each set of Novan Elites Sparta vehicles contains 6 x Spartas, 6 x double sided rear hatches, plain on one side, fleur-de-lys on the other.

 

Novan Elites Tainted - Affray Squads

Operating on the fringes of Novan space these renegade Elites of a fallen great house have turned to piracy and raiding to survive. Alongside the remaining regular human forces from the same house and various allies of  unknown origin these so called Tainted are becoming an existential threat to the Novan Hegemony.

Each Novan Elites Tainted Affray set contains:

8 x Sprues 

 

Novan Elites Tainted - Characters & Specialists

Tainted armies maintain a warped semblance of the Leadership structure of their loyal Novan origins,

Each Novan Elites Tainted Characters & Specialists set contains:

4 x Sprue A

4 x Sprue B

 

Tainted Decimator Heavy Tank

The Decimator Heavy Tank is a new design of super-heavy war engine utilised by Tainted Novan Elites forces - the origin of this unusual vehicle and just who manufactures them remains a mystery.

Each Tainted Decimator Heavy Tank set contains one multi-part super-heavy vehicle model.

Height 5.4cm, Width 6.8cm.

 

Tainted Hecate Interceptor

Maneuverable and well armed, Tainted Interceptors are powered by nuclear cells, such that even in death their pilots may bring woe.

Each Tainted Interceptor set contains 4 x Interceptor models.

Length 5.6cm

 

Tainted Charon Ground Attack Fighter

A variant of the Hecate interceptor the Charon has been designed as a light ground attack aircraft capable of rapid response and with a surprising amount of firepower for it's size.

Each Tainted Charon fighter set contains 4 x fighters.

Length: 5.6cm

 

 

Skinner Drop troops

Skinner armies are known to use Drop Troops equipped with rocket packs as special forces, deployed from the air they encircling the enemy and attacking from unexpected directions.

Each Skinner Drop Troops set contains:

2 x Leaders Sprues

8 x Drop Troopers Sprue A

 

Gobblers Light Field Guns Set

Skinnerz utilise a wide variety of light artillery pieces to support their armies, these are commonly towed by fast tractors enabling them to be rapidly deployed on the battlefield. 

Each Gobblers light artillery set contains, 4 x Tractor Vectors, 4 x Field Pieces (1 of each ) and 20 x Gobblers crew figures (2 sets of 10). 

Note that there is still some detail work to do on these yet and the rocket model will be a separate casting from the carriage.

Skinnerz Heavy Artillery Set

Less common than the Skinnerz field artillery are these heavy ordinance pieces deployed mostly in support of major assault operations on enemy cities, they can also be found defending Skinnerz military bases and installations. 

Heavy Cannon (5 part kit)

Beam Cannon (5 part kit)

Long Range Missile (6 part kit)

Each Skinnerz heavy artillery set contains, 3 x Tractor Vectors, 3 x Gun Limbers, 3 x heavy artillery models one of each variant.

Note that should funding allow we can create an individual Limber for each weapon type. Also the possibility of Skinnerz crew figures exists.

 

Novan Tribune (Hector Variant)

Novan Regulars field various configurations of Tribune Heavy Tank; The most commonly found among the ranks of the Novan hegemony are the Hector Variant. Festooned with multiple cannons and anti-personnel heavy machineguns, they are a fearsome all-round vehicle, capable of taking on both enemy tanks and infantry mobs with confidence.

Each Novan Tribune (Hector Variant) set contains 3 x multi-part Novan Hector model kits.

Length 4.5cm

 

Novan Tribune (Achilles)

The Achilles variant of the Tribune tank replaces the standard tanks twin cannon in the turret with two long barrelled anti-tank cannon, designed to engage enemy armour at extreme range they have proven most effective in this roll. Used primarily on the flanks of and armoured attack it is not uncommon however to also see them leading spearhead formations in the shock assault roll.

Each Novan Tribune (Achilles variant) set contains 3 x multi-part Novan Achilles model kits.

 

Novan Tribune (Turnus)

The Turnus yet another variant of the Tribune heavy tank this particular version has been created to address the infantry and light vehicle wave tactics often preferred by Skinnerz armies. The turret contains two large calibre heavy rotary cannon that can throw out a prodigious amount of fire power, devastating to even the most heavily armoured infantry and shredding light vehicles with ease. 

Each Novan Tribune (Turnus variant) set contains 3 x multi-part Turnus model kits.

 

Novan Firestorm Heavy Flamethrower tank

The "Firestorm" variant of the churchillian tank has been specially modified to bring cascades of flaming napalyde raining down upon the enemies of the Commonwealth.

Each Novan Firestorm set contains 3 x multi-part Novan Firestorm tank model kits.

 

Novan Convent Redeemer

The Novan Convents are often believed by outsiders to engage in the forbidden arts known as "Religion", but in truth they are merely appropriators of ancient titles and attitudes, using the rituals and practices of the mystics of old Earth to hone their minds and bodies into facilitators of the King's Justice.

A combination of capable army and secret police, the Convents are fearsome opponents.

It is unknown as to whether the pilots of the mechs known as "Redeemers" are in conscious control of the vehicles they ride to war, or if they are criminals sentenced to a fatal destiny by the harsh order of the King's covert lawgivers.

Each Convent Redeemer set contains:

- 3x Redeemer body A

- 3x Redeemer body B

- 6x Left Arm

- 6x Right Arm

 

 

 

Novan Regulars in Urban Combat Uniform

Each Novan Urban Regulars set contains:

8 x ten man squads

 

 

Novan Urban Regulars Specialists

Each Novan Urban Regulars set contains:

4 x Command sprues

4 x Heavy Support sprues

 

 

 

Eloi Phase Walkers

Each Eloi Phase Walkers set contains 80 x Eloi Phase Walker infantry models.

 

Tainted Heavy Elites

Each Tainted Heavy Elites set contains 80x Tainted Heavy Elites infantry models.

 

Tainted Heavy Elites Command

Each Heavy Elites Command set contains 21 x command infantry figures, 3 of each sculpt.

 

Novan Female Political Officers

Each Novan Female Political Officers set contains 10 x infantry models, 2 of each sculpt.

 

 

 

Novan Elites Gladiators, Mk2

Each Novan Elites Mk2 Gladiators set contains 6x Mk 2 Gladiators three leg poses, 2x of each weapon arm (16x weapons, total), and 4x Dorsal Missile Pods.

 

Tainted Rampager Light Tanks

A light support tank the Rampager is assumed to be manufactured from the same source as the super heavy Decimator this vehicle can be seen escorting it's heavier sibling into battle as well as operating independently in attack swarms formations.

Each Rampager set consists of 4 x multi-part Rampager tank models.

 

 

 

Backers' Rewards:


For every £200 you spend we will give you £20 of credit to spend either on further models from this campaign, or models from the Vanguard Miniatures website.

We are also looking at possible backers freebie character figures for late in the campaign.

Stretch goals funding path:

£2700 Tribune heavy tanks (Achilles and Turnus) variants released. GOAL ACHIEVED.

£2850 Eloi Phase Walkers and Elites Gladiators Mk2 released. GOAL ACHIEVED.

£3000 Female political officers released. GOAL ACHIEVED.

£3200 Tainted elites in heavy armour released. GOAL ACHIEVED.

£3500 Tainted Rampager light tank released. GOAL ACHIEVED.

£3800 Tainted Elites heavy armour command released. GOAL ACHIEVED.

£4300 Skinnerz Vector gun tractor and towed weapons set released. GOAL ACHIEVED.

£4800 Tainted Charon ground attack fighter released. GOAL ACHIEVED.

£5600 Skinnerz Heavy Artillery Battery released. GOAL ACHIEVED.

Further campaign goals under development.

 

.

story:
Do you have what it takes to become the champion of Hawai'i?

By backing this game on IndieGoGo:

  • You'll play a key role in creating the definitive version of Latice. 
  • You'll be one of the first people to play the game.
  • You'll get 1-year free membership in the World Latice League (no ads; unlimited plays, hints, and power-ups; & all current and future themes inside the Latice iOS/Android App).
  • You'll get the game with up to a 54% discount off the retail price.

 

Manufacturing and Shipping

If you like the game, please back us on IndieGoGo! We are working with Nantong Meijia, one of the leading game manufacturers in the world to get the game produced and delivered to your doorstep.

Estimated Timeline

May: Submit Files to manufacturer 

June: Manufacturing

July: Shipping from China begins 

August: Arrives in ports 

Late August: Fulfillment commences 

September: Fulfillment completed. 

Shipping Costs

Friendly Shipping — We offer friendly shipping to EU, US, Canada, Australia, and China. Backers from these regions won't pay additional money for customs or other import fees. Based on any given region, we will either ship your reward directly from within the country or will fully cover all potential import fees you might get charged for.

Risks & Challenges

Over the last 4 years we’ve sold and shipped over 100,000 games. However, the publication of a game is a highly involved process. It can be prone to mistakes and delays, even for experienced publishers. Fortunately, we know how to work through or prevent most of these issues by now and are well prepared with design to enter the manufacturing phase in May. In any case, we’re 100% dedicated to customer communication and will always be transparent about our process with regular updates along the way.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate please share with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn or any other forum that you think would like the project.

story:
A Játék

Valahol, egy messzi-messzi galaxisban, épül a NER (Némileg Erkölcstelen Ripacsok) Rendszere. Megállítani nem lehet, és neked nem is ez a célod!

  • Irányítsd a Strómanjaid!
  • Gyűjts Stróman-pontokat!
  • Mássz minél mélyebben A NAGY EMBER... kegyeibe

Mit szeretnénk & Mit kapsz

Egy csodás játékot, ami szórakoztat

  • A játékot azért fejlesztettük, hogy ne csak sírjunk, nevessünk is
  • Mindenképp megkapod a rendelésed, a cél elérésétől függetlenül
  • Reméljük, tartalmas szórakozást kínálunk Nektek!

A csomagok

Amennyiben csak ajándékokat szeretnél kapni, annak sincs akadálya.

  • 1 dollárért kaphatsz egy eredeti strómanérmét, ami kiválóan alkalmas bevásárló kocsikba
  • 5 dollárért kaphatsz egy gyönyörű Káder János-posztert

A játék célja

A célod elnyerni A NAGY EMBER kegyeit, mindenki más kárára. Ezt úgy érheted el, ha a strómanjaid biztonságban hazaérnek összesen 10 sikeres akciót végrehajtva.

A játék előkészületei és célja:

A cél elnyerni A NAGY EMBER kegyeit, mindenki más kárára. Ez úgy érhető el, ha a strómanjaid biztonságban hazaérnek, összesen 10 sikeres akciót végrehajtva.

A strómankártyákat először keverjétek össze, majd helyezzétek el a táblára, szöveggel lefelé.

Egy játékosnak négy különböző színű bábuja van, ezeket kezdés előtt a pályán kívül kijelölt helyekre kell tenni.

A játék célja mind a négy figurát a pályán körbejáratva eljuttatni a pálya közepén levő kis területre, amelynek neve ház.

A játék másik teljesítendő célja összeszedni 10 strómanpontot.

A játék szabályai

A játékosok egy kockával dobnak.

Egy bábut a saját startmezőn át kell játékba hozni, az óramutatóval ellentétes irányban.

A játékba hozásra akkor van lehetőség, ha a játékos 1-est vagy 6-ost dob.

Amennyiben nincs a játékosnak játékban egy bábuja sem, háromszor dobhat.

A bábut a színes mezőre kell helyezni, ilyenkor a játékos még egyet dobhat.

Ha a startmezőn bábu áll, akkor oda kitehető új bábu, ezáltal kidobatik az ott álló.

6-os dobás esetén nem kötelező pályán kívül levő bábut játékba hozni.

A játékosok bármelyik játékban lévő bábuval léphetnek, amennyiben az adott színű bábujuk játékban van.

A játékos a dobás után bármelyik, színben megegyező bábuval a megfelelő számú mezőt lép menetirányba.

A menetirány abban az esetben lehet fordított, ha így lehetőség nyílik egy másik játékban lévő bábu kidobására.

Megegyező színű bábuk kidobása lehetséges, sőt, ajánlott.

Amikor több bábuja van a pályán, akkor a játékos eldöntheti, hogy melyikkel lép.

A bábuk átugorhatják egymást, de az átugrott mező is beleszámít a lépésbe.

Ha egy bábu eléri a startmezőt olyan játékosnál, akinél az adott színű bábu játékban van, befordul a kerti útra, és halad a ház felé. Amelyik bábu beért a házba, az nem lép többet.

Ha a játékos egy bábuval olyan mezőre lép, amelyen egy másik játékos bábuja van, akkor azt a bábut kiüti, és azt visszaadja az általa választott játékosnak, akinek játékban volt ilyen színű bábuja, amit a szabály szerint kell újra játékba hozni.

A „kerti úton” haladó bábu már nem üthető ki. Leüthető viszont az a bábu is, amelyik a színes startmezőn áll.

Strómanpontok

Strómankártyát a játékos három különböző módon szerezhet:

  • A bábujával „hazaért” / ezzel teljesítette a strómanra bízott feladatot
  • Kiütött egy strómant / ezzel mással kapartatta ki a gesztenyét
  • A táblán a strómankártya mezőre lépett / ezzel elnyerte A NAGY EMBER dicséretét

A kártya húzása után derül ki, hogy sikeres volt-e az adott Stróman-akció. A sikeres akciók után (NYERTÉL kártyák) jár egy + strómanpont, a sikertelenek után (VESZTESZ kártyák) egy – strómanpont.

A játék befejezéséhez 10 + strómanpont elérése szükséges.

Amennyiben a negyedik stróman „hazaérkeztekor” nincs meg a kellő számú strómanpont, úgy a negyedik stróman nem léphet a házba, tovább kell köröznie a pályán mindaddig, míg meg nem szerzi a szükséges számú strómanpontot.

A strómanpontok megléte után pontos számú dobással „hazatérhet”.

TAKTIKÁK:

 

A „Dögöljön meg a szomszéd tehene” hadmozdulat:

A „Kék“ játékos vagy, kettőt dobtál, sárga bábud van játékban, akárcsak az ellenfelednek, a „Zöld“ játékosnak.

Bár a hozzád közelebb eső sárga bábu mozgása esetleg közelebb hozhatna téged a „házadhoz“, de a távolabbival lépve a „Zöld“ játékosnak lehetetlenné teszed, hogy hazaérjen.

Valódi NERLOVAG húzás, neked nem jó, de az ellenfelednek nagyon rossz!

A „Kibedobás”

A „Kék” játékos vagy, ellenfeleidnek játékban vannak a sárga bábuik, neked nincs, viszont épp egyest / hatost dobtál.

Egyes / hatos dobással behelyezed te is a sárga bábut a játéktérre.

Újra egyes / hatost dobsz, így fogsz egy másik bábut, és kidobod vele az általad előző dobásnál játékba hozott sárga bábut

Kiválaszthatod, melyik ellenfeledet dobtad ki!

Csodás mozdulat, páratlan élmény látni ellenfeleid felháborodását, valódi, NERLOVAGhoz illő megmozdulás!

A „Hátra az új előre” hadmozdulat

A „Kék” játékos vagy, épp egy egyes / hatos dobással sikerült játékba helyezned a piros bábudat, a következő dobásod egy hármas.

A szabályok értelmében hátrafele akkor mehetsz a pályán, ha lehetőséged van kidobni az ellenfeled, ami a fent említett eset, tehát kidobhatod a mögötted álló sárga bábut.

Ezt követő körben azonban, mivel a bábud már megmozdult a kiindulási helyéről, a piros bábuddal nyugodtan beléphetsz a „házba”, nem számít, hogy hátrafele indultál el.

Csodás hadművelet, ami garantáltan idegessé teszi ellenfeleid!
story_txt:
A Játék
Valahol, egy messzi-messzi galaxisban, épül a NER (Némileg Erkölcstelen Ripacsok) Rendszere. Megállítani nem lehet, és neked nem is ez a célod!

Irányítsd a Strómanjaid!
Gyűjts Stróman-pontokat!
Mássz minél mélyebben A NAGY EMBER... kegyeibe



Mit szeretnénk & Mit kapsz
Egy csodás játékot, ami szórakoztat

A játékot azért fejlesztettük, hogy ne csak sírjunk, nevessünk is
Mindenképp megkapod a rendelésed, a cél elérésétől függetlenül
Reméljük, tartalmas szórakozást kínálunk Nektek!



A csomagok
Amennyiben csak ajándékokat szeretnél kapni, annak sincs akadálya.

1 dollárért kaphatsz egy eredeti strómanérmét, ami kiválóan alkalmas bevásárló kocsikba
5 dollárért kaphatsz egy gyönyörű Káder János-posztert


A játék célja
A célod elnyerni A NAGY EMBER kegyeit, mindenki más kárára. Ezt úgy érheted el, ha a strómanjaid biztonságban hazaérnek összesen 10 sikeres akciót végrehajtva.

A játék előkészületei és célja:
A cél elnyerni A NAGY EMBER kegyeit, mindenki más kárára. Ez úgy érhető el, ha a strómanjaid biztonságban hazaérnek, összesen 10 sikeres akciót végrehajtva.
A strómankártyákat először keverjétek össze, majd helyezzétek el a táblára, szöveggel lefelé.
Egy játékosnak négy különböző színű bábuja van, ezeket kezdés előtt a pályán kívül kijelölt helyekre kell tenni.
A játék célja mind a négy figurát a pályán körbejáratva eljuttatni a pálya közepén levő kis területre, amelynek neve ház.
A játék másik teljesítendő célja összeszedni 10 strómanpontot.

A játék szabályai
A játékosok egy kockával dobnak.
Egy bábut a saját startmezőn át kell játékba hozni, az óramutatóval ellentétes irányban.
A játékba hozásra akkor van lehetőség, ha a játékos 1-est vagy 6-ost dob.
Amennyiben nincs a játékosnak játékban egy bábuja sem, háromszor dobhat.
A bábut a színes mezőre kell helyezni, ilyenkor a játékos még egyet dobhat.
Ha a startmezőn bábu áll, akkor oda kitehető új bábu, ezáltal kidobatik az ott álló.

6-os dobás esetén nem kötelező pályán kívül levő bábut játékba hozni.
A játékosok bármelyik játékban lévő bábuval léphetnek, amennyiben az adott színű bábujuk játékban van.
A játékos a dobás után bármelyik, színben megegyező bábuval a megfelelő számú mezőt lép menetirányba.
A menetirány abban az esetben lehet fordított, ha így lehetőség nyílik egy másik játékban lévő bábu kidobására.
Megegyező színű bábuk kidobása lehetséges, sőt, ajánlott.
Amikor több bábuja van a pályán, akkor a játékos eldöntheti, hogy melyikkel lép.
A bábuk átugorhatják egymást, de az átugrott mező is beleszámít a lépésbe.
Ha egy bábu eléri a startmezőt olyan játékosnál, akinél az adott színű bábu játékban van, befordul a kerti útra, és halad a ház felé. Amelyik bábu beért a házba, az nem lép többet.
Ha a játékos egy bábuval olyan mezőre lép, amelyen egy másik játékos bábuja van, akkor azt a bábut kiüti, és azt visszaadja az általa választott játékosnak, akinek játékban volt ilyen színű bábuja, amit a szabály szerint kell újra játékba hozni.
A „kerti úton” haladó bábu már nem üthető ki. Leüthető viszont az a bábu is, amelyik a színes startmezőn áll.

Strómanpontok
Strómankártyát a játékos három különböző módon szerezhet:

A bábujával „hazaért” / ezzel teljesítette a strómanra bízott feladatot
Kiütött egy strómant / ezzel mással kapartatta ki a gesztenyét
A táblán a strómankártya mezőre lépett / ezzel elnyerte A NAGY EMBER dicséretét

A kártya húzása után derül ki, hogy sikeres volt-e az adott Stróman-akció. A sikeres akciók után (NYERTÉL kártyák) jár egy + strómanpont, a sikertelenek után (VESZTESZ kártyák) egy – strómanpont.
A játék befejezéséhez 10 + strómanpont elérése szükséges.
Amennyiben a negyedik stróman „hazaérkeztekor” nincs meg a kellő számú strómanpont, úgy a negyedik stróman nem léphet a házba, tovább kell köröznie a pályán mindaddig, míg meg nem szerzi a szükséges számú strómanpontot.
A strómanpontok megléte után pontos számú dobással „hazatérhet”.

TAKTIKÁK:
 
A „Dögöljön meg a szomszéd tehene” hadmozdulat:
A „Kék“ játékos vagy, kettőt dobtál, sárga bábud van játékban, akárcsak az ellenfelednek, a „Zöld“ játékosnak.

Bár a hozzád közelebb eső sárga bábu mozgása esetleg közelebb hozhatna téged a „házadhoz“, de a távolabbival lépve a „Zöld“ játékosnak lehetetlenné teszed, hogy hazaérjen.
Valódi NERLOVAG húzás, neked nem jó, de az ellenfelednek nagyon rossz!
A „Kibedobás”
A „Kék” játékos vagy, ellenfeleidnek játékban vannak a sárga bábuik, neked nincs, viszont épp egyest / hatost dobtál.
Egyes / hatos dobással behelyezed te is a sárga bábut a játéktérre.

Újra egyes / hatost dobsz, így fogsz egy másik bábut, és kidobod vele az általad előző dobásnál játékba hozott sárga bábut

Kiválaszthatod, melyik ellenfeledet dobtad ki!
Csodás mozdulat, páratlan élmény látni ellenfeleid felháborodását, valódi, NERLOVAGhoz illő megmozdulás!
A „Hátra az új előre” hadmozdulat
A „Kék” játékos vagy, épp egy egyes / hatos dobással sikerült játékba helyezned a piros bábudat, a következő dobásod egy hármas.

A szabályok értelmében hátrafele akkor mehetsz a pályán, ha lehetőséged van kidobni az ellenfeled, ami a fent említett eset, tehát kidobhatod a mögötted álló sárga bábut.

Ezt követő körben azonban, mivel a bábud már megmozdult a kiindulási helyéről, a piros bábuddal nyugodtan beléphetsz a „házba”, nem számít, hogy hátrafele indultál el.
Csodás hadművelet, ami garantáltan idegessé teszi ellenfeleid!

story:
Thanks for checking out our project! 

We are creating some awesome and affordable Cthulhu Mythos drink coasters to showcase our designs! 

We are also committed to getting our coasters into the hands of our backers in less than two weeks! We are super excited as our first sample products turned out amazing! The color and detail is astonishing for a coaster and what makes it even better is the production and shipping was exceptionally quick!

To make getting them to you affordable and quick, the coasters are being shipped USPS First Class postage in business envelopes. Four coasters to an envelope. 

    We have a whole bunch more designs in the works and we want to bring them to you to add new levels of excitement to your gaming, snacking, and lifestyle! If you like our art please show us some love. 

The coasters are 3.7” in diameter and are printed in full color on 60 pt. coaster board. 

Our coasters will soak up condensation and keep your table dry for the next round.

Cthulhu Honey Mead drink coasters stacked up. Size is 3.7” diameter.

 

Reworking the original Cthulhu pencil sketches for the drink coaster design. 

Detail Close-Up of the white text on the drink coaster:

“MISKATONIC WOODS BREWERY • ARKHAM, MA • USA"

How are the drink coasters being shipped?

The drink coasters are being shipped by the USPS (United States Postal Service) both for domestic and world-wide rewards.

They are being sent in #10 size security-tinted business envelopes. Each envelope can hold up to four (4) coasters.

For example:

A pledge for a set of 4 coasters would be packed into one envelope.

A pledge for 8 coasters will be packed into two separate envelopes: (four coasters in each of 2 envelopes). 

A pledge for 12 coasters will be packed into three separate envelopes: (four coasters in each of 3 envelopes).

The coasters will be fitted securely into a very simple holder I'm making out of paper and will slide into the envelope, fitting from edge-to-edge. This should keep the coasters from slipping around inside the envelope.

I’ve already done numerous test shipments in business envelopes, both to locations within the US and overseas. No problems with damage to the coasters as of yet!

 

Risks & Challenges

As always there are risks and challenges inherent in any project, such as: outside workshops, time zones, manufacturers, suppliers, etc.

I have the assistance of a contributor/collaborator who has decades of experience in management of both small and large projects. He already tested the manufacturer and quickly received our samples in a few days and they look great!

I feel strongly that our combined skills and experience position us well for success.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign!
  • Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
For those wondering, even if we do NOT make our $160,000 goal, we will still be getting the entire project manufactured. Our goal with this is to meet minimum orders at our PREFERRED printer, who requires a rather large minimum order. We have a back up printer who will still be able to do the job for us, with no required minimum order.

 

Who are we?

Dead Tree Studios is an all new tabletop RPG team, specializing in fun, engaging, unique, tongue-in-cheek experiences. We're a group of lifelong friends who’ve been playing PnP games for the majority of our lives and, over the past few years, we started making our own. 
Our first project, Fallout: Equestria PnP, is a D10 base roll-under system, based off of the Fallout Equestria fan-fiction, written by Kkat, and derived from the original Fallout: Equestria PnP system by Kkat and Sunrise. We have spent the past four years modifying and improving this system, from traits, spells, and weapons, to playable races, and more! Our work has resulted in a truly unique, comprehensive, and insanely fun gaming experience for all, from the tabletop newbie to the hardened expert. 

Our plan is to print this game in a six-book set. Of those, four are completely written, and the first three books, dubbed the Wasteland Survival Guide, Diary of a Mary Sue, and The Locked Safe, are almost ready to print! Also available upon release will be map boards, minifigs, dice sets, and more!

Fallout: Equestria PnP

Our initial release will be making six core rule books available:

The Wasteland Survival Guide:

This is our core rule book and the only book you need to play. Any profits we might make off of it will go to charity, as it isn’t our IP (but we do have permission to use what isn’t ours). However, our goal is to ensure that we can make minimum orders on all of our products. Once we can 100% guarantee that those orders can and have been met, we will look at what money is left and donate that to a charity of Kkat's choice.  


Diary of a Mary Sue: 

Our character creation guide is designed to help both new and seasoned players of the FoE PnP System, and tabletop RPGs in general, to create characters. This book goes into the in-depth lore on our 12 core races: Earth Ponies, Pegasi, Unicorns, Zebras, Griffons, Dipped Alicorns, Natural Born Alicorns, Diamond Dogs, Hellhounds, Dragons, Ghouls and Foals. 

GM Bullshit The Overmare: 

This is our Game Master’s guide, filled with chart tables, NPCs and boss guides, traps, taint, and more! This book is designed to be everything a GM needs and then some!

Hoofticuffs:

Our martial arts guide, with over 20 different martial arts to master, from the well-known styles like Fallen Caesar to our own invented martial arts like Titan Slayer, this book focuses on everything you'll need to be a Martial Arts Master!


The Locked Safe:

List porn. Every item, perk, trait, spell, and mechanic we’ve devised for this project and more! With 1000+ items, 1500+ perks, and over 300 spells across nine spell schools, this compendium is sure to tickle your tumblers! 

The Gilded Cage:

This is our Bestiary. It will contain… well, all the beasts, and monsters, and mobs, as well as a section on how to make your own monsters, and the necessary tools to make your own, including monster perks!


You think we’re done? We’re just getting started!

3D printed figurines, which are being sculpted out of clay, scanned with a 3D scanner, then being cleaned up in a 3D editing software, are also being developed.

We will also be releasing a folding map board with your very own PipBuck 3000 world map.

A GM Blind with all the tools necessary for any GM to bring out the best (or worst) the Wasteland has to offer.

An RPG dice set with a custom-minted D2 coin.

CDs/thumb drives with digital copies of the books, character sheets, and more, as well as links to the most up-to-date lists and sheets.

All of this will be available in a complete Box Set, wrapped up in in a pretty box and shipped to your front door.

After the initial release, we also plan on releasing a series of Character, Mechanics, and Universe expansion packs, bringing 40+ new playable races, new dark and mysterious magics, vehicles, and new faraway lands tainted by the Megaspells in weird and mysterious ways.

 

What does your money accomplish? (Stretch Goals)

Long and short? A lot! If we manage to raise $160,000, we will be able to make minimum orders on all of our books, boxes, CDs, and everything else promised in this project!

At $200,000: We can not only make minimum orders, but also purchase extra stock for year-round availability and eliminate the "Annual Print Project Cycle" that plagues similar projects such as this.

At $300,000: Our promises of expansion packs become more tangible. Raising $300,000 will allow the DTS team to focus more on our next Fallout: Equestria PnP release, including a serious look at: map packs, pre-generated campaigns, more advanced mini figurines, and MORE.

At $500,000: Day jobs become less of an issue. Everyone here at Dead Tree Studios has so far been supporting this company with funds from their day jobs. Juggling a 9-5 and working on this project is exhausting, and meeting this stretch goal means the DTS Team not only gets to focus on creating tabletop games in a more full time manner, but it also allows us to have some extra funds for proper advertising, convention representation, hiring MUCH NEEDED help (including artists, editors, and web designers), and more, without financial worry.

1,000,000: For a small loan of 1 MILLION DOLLARS, we can complete our dreams of returning to the 80's and making tabletop games for a living (seriously, the thought of leaving the 80's terrifies us)! Meeting this stretch goal will allow us to turn this tabletop passion of ours into a full time job. With this, we will be able to acquire proper office space, guarantee minimum orders on our next big project, set up warehousing, and fund the development of the original games we have planned AFTER our Fallout: Equestria PnP Expansions. 

 

That's right folks, you heard it here first! We are officially powered by BackerKit! 

What does that mean for you? A lot, actually!

Not only will the BackerKit survey allow us to efficiently and professionally organize shipping, ensuring that you fine folks get your rewards AS QUICKLY as possible, it allows us to charge you for shipping AFTER we get all of our products made. This means that you, yes YOU, do not have to over pay on shipping due to our guesses, resulting in you SAVING money and not having to pay a dime more than needed for shipping. It also allows you to upgrade your pledges halfway through the campaign, including add-ons! 

 

BackerKit add-ons, you say?

We do! We do say BackerKit add-ons!

By either over paying for your reward tier, and receiving in-store credit with Backer-Kit, or by simply paying for your add-ons in BackerKit, you can add on:

  • Any one book of your choice for $40 each.
  • The CD with digital copies of all the books and more for $25 each.
  • A dice set with a set of Chessex dice, a grey velour dice bag, and our custom minted D2 coin for $12 per set.
  • Any one, 2 inch tall mini figurine for $5 each.
  • A random, 2 inch tall "Blind-Bag" mini figurine for $4 each.
  • The foldable map board of our world map for $20 each.
  • A GM Blind for $20 each.
  • The Shelf Box to house all six rule books for $12 each.
  • A "Board Set" which includes the GM blind, foldable map board, and Shelf Box for $40 each.

As with ALL OUR REWARDS, shipping will be charged AFTER the campaign is over and we are ready to ship things out. We are doing this to ensure the most accurate shipping costs possible so you do not have to over pay.

If we manage to raise $160,000, we will be able to make minimum orders on all of our books, boxes, CDs, and everything else promised in this project!At $200,000: We can not only make minimum orders, but also purchase extra stock for year-round availability and eliminate the "Annual Print Project Cycle" that plagues similar projects such as this.At $300,000: Our promises of expansion packs become more tangible. Raising $300,000 will allow the DTS team to focus more on our next Fallout: Equestria PnP release, including a serious look at: map packs, pre-generated campaigns, more advanced mini figurines, and MORE.At $500,000: Day jobs become less of an issue. Everyone here at Dead Tree Studios has so far been supporting this company with funds from their day jobs. Juggling a 9-5 and working on this project is exhausting, and meeting this stretch goal means the DTS Team not only gets to focus on creating tabletop games in a more full time manner, but it also allows us to have some extra funds for proper advertising, convention representation, hiring MUCH NEEDED help (including artists, editors, and web designers), and more, without financial worry.1,000,000: For a small loan of 1 MILLION DOLLARS, we can complete our dreams of returning to the 80's and making tabletop games for a living (seriously, the thought of leaving the 80's terrifies us)! Meeting this stretch goal will allow us to turn this tabletop passion of ours into a full time job. With this, we will be able to acquire proper office space, guarantee minimum orders on our next big project, set up warehousing, and fund the development of the original games we have planned AFTER our Fallout: Equestria PnP Expansions.  That's right folks, you heard it here first! We are officially powered by BackerKit! What does that mean for you? A lot, actually!Not only will the BackerKit survey allow us to efficiently and professionally organize shipping, ensuring that you fine folks get your rewards AS QUICKLY as possible, it allows us to charge you for shipping AFTER we get all of our products made. This means that you, yes YOU, do not have to over pay on shipping due to our guesses, resulting in you SAVING money and not having to pay a dime more than needed for shipping. It also allows you to upgrade your pledges halfway through the campaign, including add-ons!  BackerKit add-ons, you say?We do! We do say BackerKit add-ons!By either over paying for your reward tier, and receiving in-store credit with Backer-Kit, or by simply paying for your add-ons in BackerKit, you can add on:
Any one book of your choice for $40 each.
The CD with digital copies of all the books and more for $25 each.
A dice set with a set of Chessex dice, a grey velour dice bag, and our custom minted D2 coin for $12 per set.
Any one, 2 inch tall mini figurine for $5 each.
A random, 2 inch tall "Blind-Bag" mini figurine for $4 each.
The foldable map board of our world map for $20 each.
A GM Blind for $20 each.
The Shelf Box to house all six rule books for $12 each.
A "Board Set" which includes the GM blind, foldable map board, and Shelf Box for $40 each.
As with ALL OUR REWARDS, shipping will be charged AFTER the campaign is over and we are ready to ship things out. We are doing this to ensure the most accurate shipping costs possible so you do not have to over pay.

story:
You are the head of a cabal. Great kingdoms unwittingly do your bidding, for their wars and Crusades only serve to further your ultimate aim—control of the medieval world.

 

Who Should Get Medieval?  

Anyone who likes 90 minutes of battle, backstabbing, plagues, and Mongol hordes. Medieval is for 2 to 6 players.

Provinces and regions will fall, along with entire kingdoms, as you vie for control of the medieval world. But you’re not alone. Other cabals forge plots of their own and wage shadow wars against you, with armies and navies, assassinations and papal schemes, heretics and spies. 

Throw in a couple of plagues and claims of heresy, plus a Mongol invasion to end the game, and you’ve got yourself an evening.  

In addition to hours of raiding, warring, and backstabbing, here's a look at what you'll find when you crack open the box. As you can see, plenty of the art like the map and cards are already developed and there's more to come. We expect the final product to look much like this (plus the stretch goals).

story:
Instead of sorting through a bag of dice and miniatures for the hero you need, keep them organized in Character Crates. You've either purchased nice miniatures or you've spent hours painting them yourself. They need to be protected in their own Crate. Your Necromancer goes with those special bone dice, and your Bard needs to roll with the bright green dice with sparkles that you got at that one convention. The Character Crate keeps all of your heroes with their respective dice. You can simply grab the right Crate and head to game night. The Crate is crafted from the best American Cherry and can be passed from generation to generation of gamers.

The Character Crate has 3 primary functions

  1. Miniature Figurine Container: The Character Crate will come in 2 designs; one with a single miniature pocket and one with two miniature pockets (you will decide after the campaign. Perhaps you want to store two characters in a Crate or maybe you have a trusty companion or familiar who deserves their own space. These pockets will have foam padding to protect your heroes. These pockets are designed with plenty of room for standard 28mm miniatures.
  2. Dice Container: The larger pocket will comfortably accommodate 2 - 3 sets of polyhedral dice plus some extras. Many oversized dice will also fit, just in case you are bringing a special set of chunky D6s or other dice to the game.
  3. Dice Rolling Tray: The lid of the Character Crate is completely removable from the Crate itself and is designed to be used as a dice rolling tray. With half inch walls it should contain even the most exuberant dice rolling enthusiast. The lid/tray can be placed back on the Crate in any rotation and is held on by the lip as well as 8 rare earth magnets.

Construction

The Character Crate is crafted from American Black Cherry wood. This is one of the most prized hardwood's in America for furniture and cabinetry. As an added bonus Cherry is one of few sustainable hardwoods. Cherry ages beautifully over time. It begins light brownish-pink and over time these colors become slightly darker and richer. The Character Crate will come treated with a special finish which will enhance the natural beauty of the wood without the use of harsh chemicals. We designed each component of the Character Crate to be created out of one solid piece of wood so there will be no chance of glue failure due to changes in humidity and environment.

story:
STORY

Founded in 2018, Misty Mountain Gaming is a veteran-owned and operated dice company offering the best quality dice and the greatest customer service in the industry.  We offer the widest selection of metal and gemstone dice, as well as a wide range of leather dice bags made and manufactured exclusively by veterans.  Sustainability is paramount to us, and all materials are sourced using only farm-raised, cruelty-free materials.

We are now introducing the first handmade, solid-layered bone dice available on the market!

After years of development and refinement, we cracked the code on a proprietary process to produce solid-layered bone dice!  Other bone dice on the market typically use chunks of bone poured into a cold cast resin instead of machined or faceted by hand.  This end product more closely resembles a typical plastic dice. 

The natural tissue component of our solid-layered bone dice means that your set is guaranteed to be one-of-a-kind!  The oils on your hands will organically absorb into the dice over time, gathering more luster and warmth as they age, even becoming a part of you!

These are perfect for any RPG such as Dungeons & Dragons, Pathfinder, Shadowrun, Savage World, Math Games or anything else you can think of.  All numbers are engraved and numbers are large for easy reading, with 6's and 9's clearly marked.  Every die is quality-inspected by hand before being packaged, meaning you only get the best!

All Misty Mountain Gaming bone dice sets are unique, handcrafted items, and you should expect minor variations in color, size, shape and numeral placement.  All products include lifetime warranties.

 

BONE DICE SET OPTIONS

Ragnar's Bone Dice sets have a few different options for finishes and pip styling.  Natural Finish is the organic material devoid of any staining or other alteration process, while Stained Finish utilizes a specific staining process to give the dice a more worn and aged look.  Natural Finish dice sets additionally have three styling options for the pips: white, black, and metal. 

Choose from a single polyhedral D20, D6 6pcs and 12pcs sets, or the ultimate 7pcs Main Set that also includes a cruelty-free bovine leather bag made in Virginia by Marine Corp Veterans.  The Water Buffalo Horn Mug includes a triple seal, allowing it to be used for both hot and cold beverages.

The first 100 backers will receive a bonus D6 Bone Dice with Metal Pips!

You can view the different options below:

 

STRETCH GOAL

At 1000 backers, we will supply each order with an extra pair of D6 Bone Dice!

 

CRUELTY-FREE MATERIALS

At Misty Mountain Gaming, we are passionate about our commitment to source only cruelty-free materials.  We have meticulously selected suppliers and manufacturers that match our passion for sustainability, including the bovine leather bag included in the 7pcs Main Set.

 

CHARITABLE CONTRIBUTIONS

We are happy to have partnered with two charitable organizations we strongly support and believe in. 

The Yellow Ribbon Reintegration Program (YRRP) is a United Stated Department of Defense effort to promote the well-being of National Guard and Reserve members, their families and communities, by connecting them with resources throughout the deployment cycle.  Since 2008, YRRP has served more than 1.4 million Service members and their families.  A portion of all proceeds from the campaign will be donated to the Yellow Ribbon Reintegration Program (YRRP).

Heifer International's "Give the Gift of Water Buffalo" program recognizes the importance of these animals to rural communities throughout Southeast Asia.  Water Buffaloes make farming easier by tilling fields, providing fertilizer, and increasing crop yield which leads to a steady, dependable income.  They also provide families with rich milk that is high in protein and nutrients, and are often treated as important members of the family.  For every $25K raised, we will "Give the Gift of Water Buffalo" to a Southeast Asian family in need.

 

WHY CROWDFUND?

Over the last two years, we have traveled to over 100 fan conventions across North America and even as far as the Middle East.  Fan conventions have been an incredibly important platform to not only sell our products, but also gather feedback so we can improve our existing items and launch new ones.

Solid-layer bone dice is a concept we have worked on for a number of years and were not going to roll out until we perfected the proprietary process.  Since all our products are 100% handmade, the research and development for each iteration has been a time consuming process.

Before the start of the COVID-19 pandemic, and after many months of research and development, we perfected the proprietary manufacturing process for these solid-layered bone dice.  The pandemic has meant the cancellation of all fandom conventions, so we are looking for your support to bring these to life!

 

BACK WITH CONFIDENCE

In this campaign, our selected partners will be supplying the sustainably sourced materials and manufacturing all products.  We expect all items to ship in July if 2020 and are confident in our ability to meet these shipping estimates set out in our reward tiers.

We will keep all backers informed with news concerning the campaign, as well as important information about the production process and fulfillment.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We have been working with all of our manufacturing partners in this campaign for some time, and have complete confidence in their ability to meet our deadlines.  There is some uncertainty in the world of manufacturing and shipping right now, so we’ve been extra-conservative in our estimates for the timeline. You can back with confidence!

story:
* Please be notified that this campaign only delivers digital STL files, there is NO physical product delivery! *

** This page is made for late pledges for the kickstarter campaign. You can reach the original campaign here: http://kck.st/2XutH0A

*** Core set and stretch goals #1 to #8 have been delivered ***

**** Check http://Www.wayoftheroninminis.com for some other cool 3D printed models

Hello and welcome! 

After nearly two months of hard work I am proud to present to you the Nomadic Caravan Project, which is a collection of wagons, tents, fire camp and various props for different characters that travel around a challenging world facing hardships. Each character has their own unique backstory.

 

The story behind this project

  •  Merchant :  This merchant offers a broad range of wares, from llama spit to dragon scales! Find what you need, as long as you have the money!
 
  •   Merchant`s wife :  selling medicinal herbs and spices. If something ails you she might be able to sooth your pain!
 
  •   Fortune teller :  A woman with a good heart and the founder of the caravan, this fortune teller can reveal what lies ahead of time. She possesses magical abilities, among which is transforming herself into a younger and more seductive self! Who knows, it might come in handy one day! If you enter her tent please do not touch anything! Especially not the chest! Everyone has their secrets, right?
 
  •   Sisters of the war pact :  Every camp needs guards, and these three sisters are it for our caravan! They have a strong bond with the caravan's founder, our fortune teller, who brought these orphaned girls up as her own daughters. With the proper fee, they'll happily join you in your adventures!
 
  •   Torn face :  Fighting a ferocious monster with sharp claws left his face torn and disfigured! Lacking the proper expertise, the fortune teller resorted to just stitching the two sides of his face together. Blindness has sharpened his sense of hearing into an almost superhuman ability! His physical strength remains! No one can survive under his iron fists! 
 
  •    Hunter :  A sharp shooter with high visual acuity! No hunt is finished without securing a bounty, bringing game and valuable live specimens back for trade.

 

  •  Dishonored knight : Only a true warrior knows the depths of shame after a defeat in combat. Being overwhelmed by his loss he contemplated suicide, but some mysterious events and the arrival of the caravan prevented this outcome. The battlefield cost him one of his arms, which made possible a curious innovation!

 

  •  Troupe group : Sit a while and listen! You will find entertainment for hours while you repose after a long day's journey.
 
  •  Servant girl : She was found unconscious, with any recollection of the events that had just passed. The only thing she could remember was a dragon... yes, there was a dragon somewhere! (Stay tuned for future project!)
 
  •  Hunter - zombie version : Damn, that crate definitely had a "do not touch" sign on it! Our brave and adventurous hunter dared to get near a zombie that was found dormant in the jungle. The creature quickly sensed his presence and fiercely attacked him, succeeding in infecting him with a bite. Not being severely injured, he managed to put the creature back in its crate! But our hunter now has a secret, that will end up transforming him! (Stay tuned for future project!)
 
  •  Dwarf : Who ever heard of a dwarf that doesn't like his liquor!? This renowned merchant sells the best wines around, sometimes rarities found in deep and forgotten cellars! 
 
  •  Merchant`s daughter : Are you looking for fresh wild berries, fruits and vegetables? This is the place to look! This young merchant has a vibrant connection to nature and is easily able to source food!

 

The scale

All miniatures and props are scaled at 32 mm. All miniatures come in two version: with one inch round base and without a base. You can easily scale it in any size you want.

 

Delivery time

All of these pictures are 3d renders or just rough sketches so please be mindful that changes can occur. The core set will be available right after the campaign ends but the stretch goals will need some time to get completed (possibly 2 months). 

 

Core set and stretch goals

 

Terms and conditions

  • The STL files are for personal use only. You may not sell the prints (which is only permitted if you have purchased Merchant pledge tier)
  • You can not share/distribute the STL files. 
  • You can not sell the STL files.
  • You can not use/modify STL files to create new contents or derivatives.
  • You can not make cast, molds or mass production.
  • All copyrights belong to Little Dragon Miniatures.

* We appreciate every credit that we get!*

 

Disclaimer and printing requirements 

The quality of the printed models will depend on your printer, printer settings, and your experience. We are not responsible for any errors that might occur.

 

Risks and challenges

The risk is minimal since there is NO physical delivery involved. If I find any errors with the files, those can get fixed and replaced quickly. You will get the core set at the end of the campaign. I hope I can finish all the stretch goals and deliver them on time (presumably within 2 months), but delays may occur as the future is hard to predict.

 

Thank you and happy printing!

story:
The Folio: Black Label series are fantasy adventure modules that is compatible with BOTH classic Advanced Dungeons & Dragons and 5th Edition D&D formats.  It combines what I enjoyed most from the heady days of of the late 1970s and the 1980s swords & sorcery storytelling. 

The Folio: Black Label #2 continues in the same locations as Black Label #1, and is going to have even more adult edge than is found in the standard Folio, and yes, there might be some nudity, and maybe some horror, and maybe a twisted quality here or there, but at the base its really just about the unfettered fun of hacking and slashing your way through a pulp style adventure with blatant evil doers, magical treasures, and exposed flesh.  

So, I'm throwing out the playbook for 2019, and turning the flux capacitor back to the early days of gaming.  I hope some of you will join me. 

Who is this adventure for?: It will be based around  classic AD&D gaming mechanics, while also have 'grey' stat and  treasure blocks for 5th Edition D&D,  so it is easily playable in  BOTH formats.  It has been designed for  6-8 characters, roughly 3rd  through 5th, and will include a Virtual  Table Top map without secret doors, traps, and numbers.  

What does the adventure for The Citadel of the Golden Spider Queen revolve around? Well, this will be a standard swords & sorcery based adventure that deals with a sacred temple complex located in the caldera of a still simmering volcano.  The adventurers will have to collect an item to thwart the heat of the temple, and then defeat the Golden Spider Queen and her minions inside the suspended complex above a lake of lava.

What are all the other Folio products? The bulk of the Folio adventure series has  been in physical form and can be found at artofthegenre.com.   For the  purposes of some of the upper pledge levels, these previously  produced  adventures are offered.  Thus far, there  have been  21 Folio standard removable cover adventures, and 6 hardcover Folio books  (3 compile and reprint the Folio campaigns, and 2 are gaming supplements). 

What are the 'Orange Spine' books?: These 'Complete' volumes include not only all the information from 6 Folio adventure modules, but also 6 or more 'mini-adventure' supplements  added for extra content, iconic character cards that are playable, and a  gazetteer supplement that defines the world the adventure takes place  in.  Also included is the Storyteller's Arcana, a 128 page DM & Player guide of my own tips and experiences in 30 years of gaming, and the Folio of Fiendish Monsters with 115 new monsters.  ALL these books are in in both AD&D and 5th Edition D&D formats. 

*TRADEMARK DISCLAIMER

"D&D" and "AD&D" are trademarks of Wizards of the Coast, LLC. Art of the Genre is not affiliated with Wizards of the Coast LLC. We make no claim to, or challenge to, such trademarks.

 

$6000: Setting Map!  I will include a map of the area in which the Black Label Series takes place so that the DM and players can become familiar with where they are in the Nameless Realms.

$7000: Campaign Gazetteer: More information on the setting so that DMs can begin to create their own adventures in the areas where the Black Label Series takes place.

Risks & Rewards:

Since 2012, Art of the Genre has run over 50 successful crowd-funding campaigns, delivering 8 fantasy and science fiction novels, 20 Folios adventures, and many other small projects over that 7 year span.

This is a personal passion project for all the authors and artists involved, so we are as anxious as our backers to see these volumes become a reality as quickly as possible, however, life does sometimes have delays, and crowd-funding must understand that, but our track record should prove we always get out products out to our supporters as soon a humanly possible.

story:
About

 

The Gamefolio System 2.0 is an adaptable, intelligent, purpose-built system of bags, cases, and accessories for gaming enthusiasts. Our solutions work with tabletop games, board games, card games, miniatures games, dice games, RPG, and more! Our gear is perfect for gaming on the go and will take your gaming experience to a whole new level!

Our products feature a lifetime guarantee, durable, highly water-resistant fabric, protective, impact resistant foam padding, high-quality metal hardware, self-healing zippers, seat belt grade handles and shoulder straps, and a variety of pockets, pouches, compartments, and configurations to take care of your gaming gear like a boss.

Our 1.0 system was a huge success on Kickstarter in 2016 and we are excited to share with you the next step in our evolution, The Gamefolio System 2.0. Pledge now to help us bring this project to life!

The Gamefolio System is totally unique. It’s got that special “one of a kind” quality that makes people take notice. It adapts to your games and your gaming lifestyle.

  • Games are different. They use various combinations of boards, cards, miniatures, tiles, dice, tokens, coins, and other components.
  • Gaming situations are different. They can include game nights at home, out with friends, hanging out with your local guild, at your local game store or cafe, or hitting up gaming conventions and tournaments. They can also include traveling across town or around the globe.

Our gear was designed with all of this in mind and has got your back!

Your games and our gear will become best friends! Our gear will allow you to instantly customize your game carrying, organization, storage, and protection. Gamefolio cases and the Vault bag maximize the number of games and gear you can carry in a minimized amount of space. Board games, card games, miniatures, dice, RPG? There’s a Gamefolio for that and the Vault duffle works great directly with your game boxes, our Gamefolio cases, foam trays or a combination. Using Gamefolios has the added benefit of protecting your game boxes and the artwork thereon while keeping your game pieces from getting jumbled like a tossed salad or falling all over the place should you accidentally drop, bump or knock over a Gamefolio or the bag they are in. Game boxes aren’t so forgiving.

The Vault duffle bag works with tabletop games, board games, card games, dice games, miniatures, and more. It works great directly with game boxes, all types of Gamefolios, and foam trays for cards and miniatures! It's durable, highly-water resistant, padded construction is perfect for game nights with friends, traveling with your games, gaming conventions or tournaments, as well as taking care of your games at home. The Vaults innovative full zipper opening gives you easy access to everything inside. This latest version of the Vault has an upgraded padded handle with snap closure to let you get down to gaming lightning fast. It also has seat belt grade handles and shoulder straps. The side pouches can hold Small Gamefolios, Binder Gamefolios or additional games, snacks, drinks, electronics, pens, paper, and whatever else you need while gaming on the go!

 

 

The Large Gamefolio has the same durable, highly-water resistant, padded construction as our other bags and cases. It comes with its own shoulder strap and is perfect for gaming on the go on its own or inside the Vault duffle bag. (Up to two Large Gamefolios can fit inside the Vault duffle) It pairs perfectly with our foam trays for card heavy games and miniatures or without to hold larger games with lots of pieces. It has 2 large pockets inside for play mats, card binders, boards, and other gear. The outside has pen holders and a drink pouch that can also carry a play mat or other gear.

 

 

This is the 2.0 version of our Classic Gamefolio, the one that started it all! It has the same high quality, durable, water-resistant, padded construction as our other bags and cases and is also shoulder strap compatible. (Shoulder strap not included) This 2.0 version now has removable pocket strips, further increasing the modularity and usability of this case. It also has a large dedicated pocket for game boards and comes with 6 removable zipper pouches for organizing all your game pieces. Use Classic Gamefolios on their own or with our Vault duffle bag. The Vault can hold 4-5 Classic Gamefolios, depending on how full each case is. One to three games or more can fit inside each Classic Gamefolio depending on the size and structure of each game.

 

 
 

The Small Gamefolio case has the same high quality, durable, water-resistant, padded construction as our other bags and cases and is also shoulder strap compatible. (Shoulder strap not included) It is perfect for smaller games, card games, dice games, and similar. The Small Gamefolio works great on its own or with our Vault duffle bag. The Vault can hold two Small Gamefolio cases in each side pouch, for a total of four. One to three small games can fit inside each Small Gamefolio depending on the size and structure of each game.

 

 
 

 

The Binder Gamefolio case has the same high quality, durable, water-resistant, padded construction as our other bags and cases. Its modular design includes a removable one-inch, three-ring binder insert as well as a large inner pocket and pen holder. It is excellent for CCG and other card games. Removing the three-ring binder insert makes the Binder Gamefolio usable for game boards and other options. The Binder Gamefolio works great on its own or with our Vault duffle bag. The Vault can hold one Binder Gamefolio case in each side pouch. (Card pages are not included).

 

 

Our EVA Foam Card Tray is perfect for card heavy games, CCG, TCG, Deck Builders, and more. So whether you're into Magic the Gathering, Pokemon, Dominion or other card heavy games, the EVA Card Tray has got your back. With 9 modular removable foam dividers included, organizing your decks is a snap. Our Card Tray works with loose cards, sleeved cards, double sleeved cards, deck boxes of all kinds, dice bags, and more. The Card Tray fits right inside our Large Gamefolio, making gaming on the go with large numbers of cards an easy endeavor. It holds 2,000+ cards depending on sleeve or deck box use and what kind.

 

Our Foam Trays for Miniatures come in various sizes to fit either directly in the Vault duffle bag or the Large Gamefolio case. Options include 1", 2", 3", & 4" pluck foam or solid foam trays. You can customize the pluck foam trays by simply plucking out the pre-cut foam cubes in the configuration you want. The solid foam trays give you full control to customize them exactly how you want, allowing you to cut them to the specific design and depth needed to cradle each game piece perfectly. Each foam tray features a high-quality, durable EVA foam base with a soft foam upper, ideal for protecting your game pieces.

Color Options

Gamefolio Cases and Vault Duffle Bags come in the following 4 color options as shown in the image below; Blue, Green, Gray, Purple. (Black will become an option if that stretch goal is met):

 

To back The Gamefolio System 2.0, choose a reward level that contains the specific reward you want in the right side column toward the top of this page. It's that simple! Once you have pledged, sit back and relax... But, only after you've told all your friends about us!!! We'll collect your shipping info, color options, add-ons, and shipping fees after the project ends, through our pledge manager.

Once you pledge, you're in for a fun ride. Throughout our campaign, we'll be updating backers with info and pictures, game nights with the team, and other fun stuff.

 

 

 

Backers will be able to add-on additional reward items and upgrade their pledges through our pledge manager after the campaign ends. Add-ons are completely optional and may require increased pledge amounts and shipping fees. ALL add-ons will be managed through the pledge manager; so no need to increase your pledge through the campaign for add-ons but if you do, any extra funds will automatically roll over into the pledge manager for use there.

Add-On Menu: (The following items will be available as add-ons through the pledge manager. Let us know if you don't see something that you'd like us to consider adding as an add-on.)

  • $1 Each: Tasty Card Sleeves, Pack of 50 (by Tasty Minstrel Games)
  • $5 Each: Extra Zipper Pouches, Bundles of 6
  • $15 Each: Vault Rain Cover
  • $10 Each: Additional Shoulder Straps
  • $10 Each: Foam trays for Miniatures for the Large Gamefolio
  • $15 Each: Foam trays for Miniatures for the Vault duffle
  • $15 Each: EVA Foam Card Tray with 9 removable dividers
  • $20 Each: Small Gamefolio
  • $20 Each: Binder Gamefolio
  • $30 Each: Classic Gamefolio 2.0
  • $55 Each: Large Gamefolio NO Foam Trays
  • $65 Each: Large Gamefolio w Card Foam Tray
  • $65 Each: Large Gamefolio w 2 Miniature foam trays
  • $80 Each: Vault duffle bag with shoulder strap

How Add-Ons Work:

Want to add additional items from the above list to your reward? How about extra Gamefolio cases, another Vault bag, or some additional foam trays? No worries, it’s easy to do:

1. Choose a reward level during the campaign: Choose one reward level on the campaign to become a backer of this project. You will get all items in that reward level.

2. Want to add-on something? If you want to add something additional to your reward, check out the Add-On Menu above. If it's in the Add-On Menu you will be able to add it to your reward through the pledge manager after the campaign ends. The pledge manager works like a typical website shopping cart. You will be able to go through it and select any add-ons you want to add to your pledge reward.

3. Relax, you're done for now: Once the campaign ends, you’ll get an email invite to the pledge manager. Through the pledge manager, you will be able to add any additional items you are interested in from the Add-On Menu above to your rewards. Other details like shipping information, color choices, and shipping fees will also be collected through the pledge manager after this campaign has ended.

All shipping fees and shipping info for your rewards will be collected through our pledge manager after this campaign has ended.

We ship Worldwide and our project is US, EU, AU, CA, and CN Friendly! This means that rewards bound for those areas will ship from within the specific country/region, resulting in no additional customs charges for backers within these areas. We will look to do the same in other regions if we get a high enough number of backers in each region to make it viable. If you are outside of those areas we will be shipping to you from a fulfillment center as near you as possible to keep shipping as low as possible. We work hard to ensure the best shipping fees and care for your reward shipments.

Shipping Fees

Below are the actual shipping rates for each reward level. REMEMBER: All shipping fees will be collected through our pledge manager after this campaign ends. If you have any questions on shipping please send us a direct message.

Please note that the shipping fees listed above are for the specific reward listed at the top of each column. Any additional rewards that you add-on in the pledge manager may add to the cost of shipping, but they will be bundled with your overall package so the total shipping will be much less than if the items were to be shipped separately.

We will be using the Backerkit pledge manager after the campaign ends to collect shipping info, shipping fees, color options, and for any additional reward add-ons or upgrades you choose.

IMPORTANT: Once we have it ready, you will receive an email invite to the pledge manager, so please make sure the email you have on your account is accurate. We will also send an update through the campaign to make sure everyone is aware that the pledge manager has opened. Please help us get your rewards to you as soon as possible by completing the pledge manager as soon as you can once it is open. Be prepared to fill out the pledge manager with your shipping info, color choices, and any add-ons you want.

What do real gamers think about the Gamefolio System?

 

 

Years ago we were hanging out with several friends, discussing various aspects of gaming and the industry in general.

We discussed our love of games, various ways to organize and transport them easily, and ways to make sure they were safely protected and well taken care of. We were tired of subpar non-solutions and thought it absurd that our beloved games were stuck being carried around from place to place in big blue shopping bags, or plastic tote bins, continually scuffing, scratching and damaging the beautiful box art along the way. (Not to mention the inevitable tossed salad effect on the game components inside.)

As we discussed our frustrations with one another, we decided we were done settling and that something had to be done. A better solution needed to be created. We set out to do just that. Over the years, with continual feedback, testing and design ideas from our team, loyal fans, and industry insiders, we have developed and refined The Gamefolio System to make playing, transporting, storing and protecting your games simple and safe.

We are excited to take this dream to the next level with your help! Please back this project and join us for an incredible journey. Thanks for your support.

 

We love games and are obsessive about creating systems for organizing, protecting, and streamlining the tabletop gaming experience.

Curtis is a serial entrepreneur and inventor. He also has experience in manufacturing and global fulfillment. He is continually looking at things from a different perspective, always striving to create something new or improve that which exists. His favorite games include Settlers of Catan and Pandemic.

Julie, the real brains behind the operation, has a background in graphic design, marketing, and management. Her favorite game is Dominion.

This dynamic duo has built several successful companies. They know how to efficiently manage resources and money to make a business or product successful, and deliver quality results to customers.

We are backed up by the InIt Gear team, a number of successful IndieGoGo and Kickstartercreators, other mentors, advisors, friends, and supporters like you.

We understand the critical importance of taking care of our backers. We are committed to using our skills, experience, connections, blood, sweat, and tears to make sure that your pledges are used wisely to take The Gamefolio System to the next level and get you your rewards!

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We delivered successfully on our original Gamefolio System 1.0 project and have a ton of business success in our DNA from other endeavors. We’ve also teamed up with experienced manufacturers to take this dream to the next level. They produce products for Nike, Adidas, and other high profile clients. They know how to manufacture high-quality goods at scale. We are confident that we will deliver what we say we will. Should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with transparency and care for you, our backers.

Forecasting Risk
If all goes well during our funding campaign, we'll finish up with a lot of backers and demand. Of course, we're trying our hardest to predict our future demand and plan accordingly, but it's not an exact science. However, we have put in place systems and partnerships that allow us to scale up as needed.

Supply Chain Risk
As outlined above, our manufacturer is more than capable of handling our needs now and into the foreseeable future. Though highly unlikely, should any major issues arise that could jeopardize our current manufacturer's ability to produce and deliver on this project, we have additional manufacturer relationships we can shift to. We have established these backup manufacturing supply chains to make sure we can take care of our backers and bring our products to life. However, as prepared as we are there is still some risk in this area and some things that are out of our direct control. If a container shipment is delayed for 2 weeks in customs or a batch of new material doesn't pass QA testing, our fulfillment schedule — even if padded — can start to slip.

Force Majeure
Hey, stuff happens, but no matter what that stuff may be, we will push through together to make this happen and deliver your rewards. That’s our commitment to you.
