Other details like shipping information, color choices, and shipping fees will also be collected through the pledge manager after this campaign has ended.

All shipping fees and shipping info for your rewards will be collected through our pledge manager after this campaign has ended.
We ship Worldwide and our project is US, EU, AU, CA, and CN Friendly! This means that rewards bound for those areas will ship from within the specific country/region, resulting in no additional customs charges for backers within these areas. We will look to do the same in other regions if we get a high enough number of backers in each region to make it viable. If you are outside of those areas we will be shipping to you from a fulfillment center as near you as possible to keep shipping as low as possible. We work hard to ensure the best shipping fees and care for your reward shipments.

Shipping Fees
Below are the actual shipping rates for each reward level. REMEMBER: All shipping fees will be collected through our pledge manager after this campaign ends. If you have any questions on shipping please send us a direct message.

Please note that the shipping fees listed above are for the specific reward listed at the top of each column. Any additional rewards that you add-on in the pledge manager may add to the cost of shipping, but they will be bundled with your overall package so the total shipping will be much less than if the items were to be shipped separately.

We will be using the Backerkit pledge manager after the campaign ends to collect shipping info, shipping fees, color options, and for any additional reward add-ons or upgrades you choose.
IMPORTANT: Once we have it ready, you will receive an email invite to the pledge manager, so please make sure the email you have on your account is accurate. We will also send an update through the campaign to make sure everyone is aware that the pledge manager has opened. Please help us get your rewards to you as soon as possible by completing the pledge manager as soon as you can once it is open. Be prepared to fill out the pledge manager with your shipping info, color choices, and any add-ons you want.

What do real gamers think about the Gamefolio System?

  Years ago we were hanging out with several friends, discussing various aspects of gaming and the industry in general.We discussed our love of games, various ways to organize and transport them easily, and ways to make sure they were safely protected and well taken care of. We were tired of subpar non-solutions and thought it absurd that our beloved games were stuck being carried around from place to place in big blue shopping bags, or plastic tote bins, continually scuffing, scratching and damaging the beautiful box art along the way. (Not to mention the inevitable tossed salad effect on the game components inside.)As we discussed our frustrations with one another, we decided we were done settling and that something had to be done. A better solution needed to be created. We set out to do just that. Over the years, with continual feedback, testing and design ideas from our team, loyal fans, and industry insiders, we have developed and refined The Gamefolio System to make playing, transporting, storing and protecting your games simple and safe.We are excited to take this dream to the next level with your help! Please back this project and join us for an incredible journey. Thanks for your support. We love games and are obsessive about creating systems for organizing, protecting, and streamlining the tabletop gaming experience.Curtis is a serial entrepreneur and inventor. He also has experience in manufacturing and global fulfillment. He is continually looking at things from a different perspective, always striving to create something new or improve that which exists. His favorite games include Settlers of Catan and Pandemic.Julie, the real brains behind the operation, has a background in graphic design, marketing, and management. Her favorite game is Dominion.This dynamic duo has built several successful companies. They know how to efficiently manage resources and money to make a business or product successful, and deliver quality results to customers.We are backed up by the InIt Gear team, a number of successful IndieGoGo and Kickstartercreators, other mentors, advisors, friends, and supporters like you.We understand the critical importance of taking care of our backers. We are committed to using our skills, experience, connections, blood, sweat, and tears to make sure that your pledges are used wisely to take The Gamefolio System to the next level and get you your rewards!  Get Your Project Funded Today!   
 
Risks and challenges
We delivered successfully on our original Gamefolio System 1.0 project and have a ton of business success in our DNA from other endeavors. We’ve also teamed up with experienced manufacturers to take this dream to the next level. They produce products for Nike, Adidas, and other high profile clients. They know how to manufacture high-quality goods at scale. We are confident that we will deliver what we say we will. Should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with transparency and care for you, our backers.
Forecasting RiskIf all goes well during our funding campaign, we'll finish up with a lot of backers and demand. Of course, we're trying our hardest to predict our future demand and plan accordingly, but it's not an exact science. However, we have put in place systems and partnerships that allow us to scale up as needed.
Supply Chain RiskAs outlined above, our manufacturer is more than capable of handling our needs now and into the foreseeable future. Though highly unlikely, should any major issues arise that could jeopardize our current manufacturer's ability to produce and deliver on this project, we have additional manufacturer relationships we can shift to. We have established these backup manufacturing supply chains to make sure we can take care of our backers and bring our products to life. However, as prepared as we are there is still some risk in this area and some things that are out of our direct control. If a container shipment is delayed for 2 weeks in customs or a batch of new material doesn't pass QA testing, our fulfillment schedule — even if padded — can start to slip.
Force MajeureHey, stuff happens, but no matter what that stuff may be, we will push through together to make this happen and deliver your rewards. That’s our commitment to you.

story:
About

PitchEasy is a creative card game for ideas that uses real products, real key phrases and adult humour. Perfect for 4 to 10 people with a playing time approx 20 to 60 minutes.

 

We've created 3 PitchEasy editions for you to choose from:



Filtered Edition​ (contains light humour) 

Perfect for professional settings, events and workshops

 

Unfiltered Edition (contains adult humour and innuendos)

Perfect for relaxed social and business settings

 

Filthy Edition (contains adult humour, innuendos and political incorrectness)

Only suitable for social settings - play at your own risk

 

 

How it works

Each round has a FundIt card that sets the pitching criteria for everyone.

  • The colours indicate the order in which the cards are introduced
  • A normal eye icon means that players are free to look at their cards before pitching
  • A blind icon indicates that the round is a Blind Mode: players are not allowed look at their cards - until they flip them during their pitch
  • A single person icon indicates that all players have to pitch individually for the round
  • A group icon indicates that players need to form teams and divide the cards amongst themselves and bring out a pitch together

 

Each player/team will be given a product to pitch about

 

Each players/teams are given phrases to include in their pitch.

 

Players/teams need to incorporate their cards into a pitch. it's just like comparing apples for apples - the pitch doesn't need to be perfect.

 

Here's some examples:

  • Study mode examples (Players allowed to look at their cards)
 
Individual pitch: Study Mode -  (Unfiltered Edition)
 
Group pitch: Study Mode (Filtered Edition)
 
Individual pitch: Study Mode (Filtered Edition)
 
 
  • Blind mode example (Players are not allowed to look at their cards before their pitch)
 
Individual pitch: Blind Mode (Unfiltered Edition)

 

 

After all players/teams have pitched, they vote for their favourite pitch/product  - giving their blue card to that player/team - don't vote for yourself, it's sad.

 

The aim of the game is to win the most FundIt cards, so if you have the most blue cards... you win the game and the bragging rights is all yours.

 

Have a go

 

Why Are We Crowdfunding?

  • We found that PitchEasy is the perfect ice-breaker that isn't cheesy and fun to play.
  • It's great for parties, creative kickoffs and socialising in the workplace.

We started this crowdfunding campaign because we want to create new versions of PitchEasy so the cards can be related to specific things such as apps, travel, dogs etc. With backers and their feedback, we'll be able to affordably produce new versions of PitchEasy. 

 

What We Need

We need amazing souls (backers) to bring down our production costs with our current manufacturer in the UK. We've prototyped, tested it and PitchEasy is ready for backers. 

 

Here's an example of PitchEasy when we first started prototyping with flashcards:

PitchEasy (Filthy Edition) 

 

Where will the funds go if the funding target is achieved? All our funds will go to production and fulfilling orders. 

What happens if we don't reach our target? We'll give you back your money. 

 

What You Get

  • Each deck of PitchEasy comes with:
    • 90x Key Phrase cards
    • 30x Physical Product cards
    • 10x FundIt cards
    • 1x rigid box

 

The Perks 

  • The Early Bird 
    • 40% off any PitchEasy edition of your choice
  • Just a Deck
    • Any PitchEasy edition of your choice
  • Pitch It All Away
    • Any 3 PitchEasy editions of your choice
  • Give it to Me in Bulk
    • Any 5 PitchEasy editions of your choice
  • The Custom Pitch
    • 50 decks of your own fully customised edition of PitchEasy
      • Customised, branded and suited to your liking
        • Physical Product cards
        • Key Phrase cards
        • Fund It cards
        • Rigid box

 

The Impact

  • In America, Europe and Asia we've sold to Creative Design Agencies, Firms, Startups and Individuals. 
  • With support from our backers we'll be able to bring PitchEasy to workshops, events, accelerators and incubators.
  • Right now PitchEasy is an unstructured form of pitching - we want to develop a version of PitchEasy that follows the industry standard.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest risk/challenge will be to coordinate with shipping - we work weekends, so it's all good.  

 

Our Timeline

  • Late July - Start crowdfunding campaign
  • Late August - Crowdfunding campaign ends
  • Early September - Production and orders shipped to backers

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We don't know how to use Twitter so follow us on Facebook and Instagram.
  • If you know anyone that would love PitchEasy please share our crowdfunding campaign

story:
We succesfully ended our crowdfunding campaign at $39,649 (4173% of goal) on this popular site: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/escape/eter...
We have to thank all our backers for this huge success, but unfortunately many backers arrived late and we were really sorry to tell them that our campaign ended. We also have many news to add at our Eternity Dice project, that we would share here, so this campaign was born to do just that.
We'll start from our last reached stretch goal, so you will have all the benefits that our previous backers received, and everyone (including backers from our other campaign) can collaborate to unlock more Stretch Goals. 

We have always been fascinated by dice. Somehow we consider them as mystical objects, but all dice we've ever bought and used to play with didn't have a soul. After a walk in Vesuvius National Park, we realized that we wanted to have dice directly from Mother Earth which would be able to evoke old world feelings now lost in the traffic of the modern metropolis. So what material could be more evocative and pleasant to the touch and sight than the lava of a volcano?

Straight from the slopes of Vesuvius and forged one by one entirely by hand, these dice are made of lava (sculpted solid stone) and finely worked and certified by an artisan from Torre del Greco (Naples) specialist in the processing of lava. Lava is an ancient and eternal material and today it is a really rare stone, because the last eruption of Vesuvius occurred in 1944 and the volcano is currently dormant.

The lava of Vesuvius is different from that of Etna or the Aeolian islands since, modifying itself during the centuries, it has become rich in potassium and decreased its quantity of silice, coming to be harder than marble.

During the 17th and 18th century the magnificent Vesuvian Villas of the “Golden Mile” had statues, columns, fountains and marvellous stairways made of lava stone. Masons then established a deep relationship with the lava stones they worked, passing on their craft techniques from father to son. And today, thanks to their knowledge and commitment, the Eternity Dice are here for you.

SPREAD THE WORD

Today, we can make grow this project and give you more interesting extra perks, but we need your help to spread the word about our Eternity Dice. If you believe in this project, tell about it to your friends, on your preferred social networks (twitter, facebook, diaspora) and on your communities around the web. Thanks to each of you, because you turned this project into reality!

 
 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 
 

 

ETERNITY SKULL

Exclusive limited skull, hand carved in Vesuvian lava stone. Only 10 available.

 

ETERNITY DOMINOES

Get a complete Dominoes set: 28 pieces in Vesuvian Lava Stone in an exclusive wooden box.

story:
Welcome Fellow Gamers

Conquer the Citadel isn't just another strategy board games its a game changer in the world of political strategy tabletop gaming. I adored deeply strategic board games and history. You'd think these two tracks would have crossed long ago but to a great extent they haven't at all. So I set out to fill the void myself and Legendary Historia Games became reality. Over the course of the games development I found that most of the people I worked with had the same desires as myself for their gaming experiences. After months of testing and strategic refinement we've finally completed our goal by gamers for gamers. 

Who We Are

My name is Holden Nash the creator of Conquer the Citadel and founder of Legendary Historia Games. I've been board gaming my whole life video games just never finding a home in my heart like the tabletop feel could. You'll see this passion projected into every aspect of CTC and I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I've loved creating it. 

The Game

Conquer the Citadel incorporates elements of balancing power, alliances, enemies, and resources like no other board game has ever dreamed of accomplishing. All while maintaining a simple overall structure that just about anybody can understand. Take five minuets and read the rulebook, play a round and you'll be a puppet master in no time. Claim one of six political offices in the wake of political upheaval all vying to claim the palace for yourself. Play attack cards that smear your enemies and rob them of their wealth. That's just the tip of the strategic iceberg as you take your rightful place on the throne.

Why We're Here

Now while every element of our game has been worked out to the finest detail we still have one hole that's proven insurmountable until today. We want to give our game a more immersive feeling and to do that we need beautiful artwork that encapsulates the tone of the game while depicting your acts of political genius accurately. While we have an extremely talented artist on board with CTC it costs serious money. After all great artwork carries a hefty price tag in this case a 3000 dollar one. Once we raise the money to finish the games overall design we can workout the numbers and methods for production so we can deliver it to you. We have to take this one step at a time. Our rewards incorporate the wonderful artwork so you can get a taste of our games look to come. 

Rewards

For your tributes to Conquer the Citadel our tiers all have something to be desired. We offer patches, stickers, t-shirts, even one sheets of the art signed by the creator. No matter how much you donate you wont be disappointed. 

Thank You 

Whether you donate to our campaign, share this video, or simply tell your friends about us maybe even all three thank you for making one of my dreams a reality. I'll see you in the Citadel!

Remember Don't Inherit The Crown Conquer The Throne!

story:
Finnish version can be found here - Suomenkielinen versio videosta täällä.

December is here and the elves have a problem: There is no snow and nobody feels like Christmas. Everybody is occupied with their own things and even those who wait for Christmas can’t find it! The residents of the elf-tree need your help to find the missing Christmas.

Do you love searching which door to open in an Advent Calendar? We do too! We've created an A3 sized advent calendar with 24 puzzles, 1 for each day of December before Christmas Day. Filled with beautiful and fun art of Väinö Heinonen! Behind each door you find the picture magically transforming more and more Christmas -like!

There's 24 puzzles suitable for children that work purely within the physical calendar itself. If you want more challenge you can instead solve daily calendar puzzles to be published in our web-page.

You can get this for your own daily puzzle, but also give it out as present for others to enjoy the waiting of Christmas! All backers will get the calendar(s), we'll send these out during November to make sure they arrive on time.

How to play

There are 24 numbered hint doors and 27 un-numbered solution doors. There are two versions of the game:

For junior elves: 

  1. Open the day’s numbered hint door.
  2. Based on the hint found in the hint door find the correct solution door and open it.
  3. If you find the day’s number from the inside of the solution door, congratulations, you’ve solved the puzzle of the day! For example, on the 1st of December you will find number 1 from the inside of the solution door. If you find a different number, please close the solution door and think again!

For elves looking for more challenging puzzles:

  1. Go to ludumef.com/calendar with a web browser.
  2. Based on the hint found from the web page find the correct solution door and open it.
  3. If you find the day’s number from the inside of the solution door, congratulations, you’ve solved the puzzle of the day! For example, on the 1st of December you will find number 1 from the inside of the solution door. If you find a different number, please close the solution door and think again!

You can choose to start each day with the level you want.

Art

  • Beautiful detailed art by Väinö Häinönen
  • Loads of fun details to find
  • All the solution doors fill the big picture with new fun details

Ludumef Story

Our journey begins in the University of Helsinki, in Southern Finland. Two college students meet at a student organization dedicated to the social roleplaying game Assassin and end up running the group together for a decade. Later on we start creating puzzle games for our friends, who love our games and keep encouraging us to distribute them to a larger audience. We join forces with a third friend, and Ludum Effugium is born.

We are Ludum Effugium, a brand new company set out to create escape room style puzzle solving games. If you have any questions, you can email us to info (at) ludumef.com! Please also follow us on Twitter, @ludumef!

Special Indiegogo campaign discounts

  • 20% off from the retail price!

Help us out!

If you have any possibility share this campaign to others as well!
We are super excited to continue creating unique and exciting games and all your help is greatly appreciated.

story:
​A Growing Business

My name is Erikka and my business is called SeWeird Galactic Accessories. I make one of a kind tabletop gaming accessories by hand, which now includes dice. I did my first convention where felt ready to sell my dice, and they nearly sold out. I also was asked constantly whether or not I would be expanding my selection.  My goal is to have as many unique dice as possible to sell on my website, Etsy, and at conventions.  I need help to expand as quickly.  There are supplies I need to ensure quality and quantity. That's where this campaign comes in.

 

So far, I have successfully made sets of:

  • Red and Black
  • Orange and Black
  • Green and Black
  • Blue and Black
  • Purple and Black
  • Pink and Black
  • My own proprietary Galaxy Dice (black with blue/purple color change glitter)

 

My goal is to expand this with new colors:

  • Red/Gold Galaxy Dice
  • Mauve/Orange Galaxy Dice
  • Black/Holographic
  • Pink/Teal Galaxy Dice
  • Clear with Holographic Stars and Moons
  • Green/Purple Galaxy Dice

 

On top of new colors, I want to further refine my casting process with a pressure chamber to virtually eliminate any chance of bubbles, thus maintaining the appearance and balance of the dice.

 

What your donation goes towards:

  • A pressure pot to ensure a lack of bubbles in the dice
  • Specialized mica powder
  • Resin
  • Buffing wax (for extra shiny dice!)
  • Unique Additives for the resin (ok, ok, holographic stars)
  • Resin casting supplies (scoops, cups, mats, and stirring sticks)

 

What's in it for you?

Depending on the donation size, you can get a single set, three, or five sets of dice. Each is a full polyhedral set of your choosing. You can even mix and match if getting the multi-set perks!

The current set of perks is only good until Sunday September 22nd at 11:59pm as an early bird special. 

Oh man, this is a cool idea. Donating would be kinda rough right now though.

 That's OK!! Like my business but can't donate right this second? Here's some ways you can help:

  • Share this Campaign!! The further it gets, the better!
  • Follow my indiegogo campaign
  • Follow my social media accounts! https://www.facebook.com/SeWeirdGalactic/ and @SeWeirdGalactic on Instagram!
  • Check out my website at www.seweirdgalactic.com or my Etsy shop at www.etsy.com/shop/SeWeirdGalactic
  • See me in person and say hi at one of the many conventions I vend at!

story:
AS FEATURED IN:

                                              

TESTIMONIALS:

THE FATE REMEDY CARD GAME

It's a fresh, challenging and super fun card game based on an eternal fight between fate and free will. The game so great that nearly everybody who played it wants to have it and play it again. That is the reason why we would like you to try this unique game."Don' buy a pig in a poke" or "a cat in a sack" and test Fate Remedy card game with our free Fate Remedy card game edition. 

Each card in the Fate Remedy (pet life edition) card deck represents a different pet life event. Cards with good events bring positive points and bad events bring negative points. The winner of the game is the player that collects the highest sum of points.

Fate has an influence on cards while they are shuffled and dealt to players. Usually that is the decidive part of a typical card game because if a player gets best cards (cards with the highest value) he wins a game. The Fate Remedy card game is different than typical card games because it is designed in a way that even if a player gets very bad cards he can still win the game. 

After cards/pet events are dealt you have two options:

The only way to win the Fate Remedy card game is to collect the highest sum of points. To achieve this goal a player has to avoid bad events for all costs and has to hunt good events ruthlessly. Player has more options, tactics and alternatives to win (live the best possible pet life).  So fate can punish you with bad cards, but you still have a chance of winning this game or it can give you the most desired card and you will end up losing the game.

 

 

Card Deck Description

As expected for a dynamic and fateful card game, the game consists of 4 main card types: 

- good events/cards (2 sets)

- bad events/cards (two sets)

- food cards (1 set)

- bittersweet cards (1 set)

- Sets are pictured in the upper left corner (also recognised by the color of the frame).

- Numbers in icon show the value of the card in set (1 = smallest).

- Card point values are printed in coin icon in the upper right corner.

- Food cards and good events/cards bring positive points, bad events/cards bring negative points and bittersweet cards can surprise you with positive and negative points.

 

How to Remedy Fate

There are many options, strategies, tactics, systems and beliefs how to remedy fate. If you can make your pet happy, you are on the right path. Avoid fleas, bark in to the moon, eat moderately, do not get run over, twist your master around your finger, take pleasure in your hunting drive, etc. And if your cards are not good – punish your competitors with worst possible events. And above all never leave a good cat to others!


 

The Game So Great That the Prototype Has Been Stolen!

In the last two years more than two hundred people have tested the game. Vast majority of test players immediately loved it. Based on those test results we are very confident that a vast majority will enjoy playing the Fate Remedy card game if they will get an opportunity to play it. Most test players rated the game with an excellent rating, but one event convinced us that it was time to start the campaign.

In the year 2017 the Fate Remedy card game prototype has been stolen. Stealing is a crime that can be punished with a prison sentence, but the thief has estimated the game is worth it. This fact convinced us that the time has come for the game to be presented to the world. 

Test FATE REMEDY Card Game for Yourself

The game is so good that we don't have to use a lot of great marketing words to sell you a "pig in a poke" as many other campaigns do. A lot of us haven't forgotten how dissapointed we were when we received and tested a best seller game (or games) and found out that it is dull and boring. Don't buy "a cat in a sack" and test our play before you decide to back our project. 

You can download and test print-make-and play FATE REMEDY card game edition and rules here:

Download Print-make-and play FATE REMEDY edition

Download FATE REMEDY rules

All the cards are in low resolution, black and white and single-sided. To make your copy, you'll need a pair of scissors.

It would be awesome if you make a review of the Fate Remedy card game after the test of the game. You are welcome to publish your review of the Fate Remedy card game on Facebook or to submit it to some great internet site or other media. You are more than welcome to send your review (with some photos) to our e-mail address as well. If the project on Indiegogo is very successful we will most likely reward most influential review(s) with great prize(s)!

 

Timeline & Risks & Challenges

The Fate Remedy card game have already been designed and prototype cards have already been printed so there shouldn't be any problem with production of cards. We are confident in our ability to get Fate Ramedy cards to our backers and we will do our best to keep to timeline.

We will send perks by postal service. 
 

The Story of FATE REMEDY Card Game

It was card night in May 2012. A friend had great luck with cards that night, getting best cards over and over again. He was winning by a large margin. We, the unlucky ones, were angry.

Then someone asked if there is a card game where luck is not the main factor to win the game? A card game which enables you to win even if you get bad cards? We pondered a while and we couldn’t think of a game like that. Then there was an idea: why don’t we develop one?

And we did just that. Developing was a long process and hard work, but we also had a lot of fun and a lot of laughter.

Between November 2015 and December 2017 we organized many tests of this new card game and test players gave the game phenomenal grades. And most importantly, the test players had a lot of fun playing the game. Positive feedback and our own excitement about our card game FATE REMEDY encouraged us to start working on a crowdfunding project.

We are so happy to be here! We are also proud that we succeeded in making something positive, a card game that brings joy and laughter.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don’t hesitate to talk about this project with your friends, to make a review of the game and to share the link, review or information of the Fate Remedy card game on social networks. If you follow blogs, celebrities or radio/TV/press journalists, ask them to take a look of the project or of your review of the game. Don't forget to test the free edition of the game with your friends, family and other beautiful people around you.  This would be an enormous help!

Music: Daniel Alan Gautreau, License agreement/certificate No. 59477-MTR-89244 Neo sounds

All rights reserved.

story:
“In ages past, there lived a mysterious, dwarven wizard-king named Moebius Spinn. 

Through his countless adventures, Moebius had accomplished many great deeds and lived a very meaningful and fulfilling life, enough to fill a thousand lifetimes. 

However, as his life-cycle was coming to an end, the great wizard-king wanted to preserve his life’s work and protect the power he had gained before the constraints of his mortal bonds were broken forever. 

And so, he created a deck of cards infused with his essence, each card representing an important aspect from his deep well of knowledge. Through these cards, he would share his magic with worthy individuals destined to continue his great legacy. In that way, he could aid them in their quests, while maintaining the balance of power in the world in his absence.

It was the last act of the mighty wizard before he powered up his greatest creation… the Moebius.”

 

 

The Cards

The Moebius Deck of Wonders is designed to be a prop and handout for your favorite tabletop role-playing game.  The Moebius Deck of Wonders appears as a standard deck of cards, but once touched it will reveal its true form and strongly compel the character that touched it to choose a random card. 

They will then randomly choose a single card which instantly reveals its powers to them and becomes bound to their character for life. Your player will then have a handout that they can keep with their character as a visual reference and to interact with during card activation phases.

While system agnostic rules will be provided for each card in the deck, the cards were designed devoid of any writing or text so, as the Game Master, you can choose to create or modify the existing rules and/or create names and lore for each card to fit your world. You can even just use the cards as visual references to represent physical magic items the characters find.

Please see the FAQ’s for more detailed information.

 

 

 

 

Each Moebius Deck of Wonders will contain one of each of these 40 cards, 10 unlocked stretch goal cards, plus 10 Archmage pledge level cards, for a total of 60 cards in each deck!

Card and Tuck box design subject to change prior to going to full production.

 

 

 

 

Use the links below to help us unlock the Social Media Stretch Goals!

MEDIA LINKS FOR SOCIAL STRETCH GOALS 

SHARE THIS FACEBOOK POST:  https://www.facebook.com/mystic.dragon.games

RETWEET THIS TWITTER POST:  https://twitter.com/mystic_dragongm/status/1163245927961890816​

WATCH THIS YOUTUBE VIDEO:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ru8vK3prVyU

FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM:  https://www.instagram.com/mysticdragongames/

FAN US ON BOARD GAME GEEK:  https://boardgamegeek.com/rpgpublisher/42420/mystic-dragon-games

 

 

 

Want to learn more about The Moebius Deck of Wonder, Moebius Spinn, Mystic Dragon Game, or us personally?  Try these great podcast interviews. 

 The Kevin Long Show Podcast:  https://directory.libsyn.com/episode/index/show... 

 D&DIY Podcast: https://anchor.fm/d-n-diy  

Rollin' Bones with Ryan Howard Podcast:  https://anchor.fm/rollin-bones/episodes/Mystic-... 

Comics, Clerics & Controllers Videocast:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sf48zVrL9P8 

 

Alejandra de la Cruz Portfolio: https://www.instagram.com/janeladra/ 

Tatiana Yamshanova Portfolio: https://www.artstation.com/miryanne 

Cody Wilbourn Portfolio:  https://www.artstation.com/cody_wilbourn64 

 

Ice Cream Dice:  https://icecreamdice.com/ 

Forging Heroes Society: http://www.forgingheroessociety.com/ 

Hoop and Loom: www.etsy.com/shop/hoopandloom 

 

 

SHIPPING:

SHIPPING CHARGED AT TIME OF PURCHASE

Thank you so much for making it this far and checking out our InDemand Indiegogo page. We really appreciate you!

We will be utilizing a reputable and experienced product distributor based in China, as all of our goods will be produced there (with the exception of our dice bags). This will ultimately save you money on shipping and you will receive your rewards more quickly as the goods will be shipped directly to your door from our distributor there. 

Extra shipping will be charged with the Pledge Manager, if applicable, for any add-on's purchased after the campaign ends.

EXCEPTION

Dice Bags and Custom Deck Box: We will be shipping the Dice Bags and custom Deck Boxes separately from the the rest of the items, and any other rewards that are manufactured here in the US, so you will have a separate shipping charge for those items in the Pledge Manager. Anything shipped from the U.S. will be shipped together to save you money. For example, if you purchased the Dice Bag and the custom Deck Box together, they will be shipped together and you will only pay one shipping charge for them.

We will be using Backerkit as our Pledge Manager.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Already fully funded on Kickstarter!

Earning your trust is of utmost importance to us. Rest assured we will keep you in the loop in all things relating to this project and its progress.  A good chunk of the writing is completed, with exception of any social media stretch goals that unlock rule conversions. However, since these will be digital rewards, it will not delay in the manufacturing of the physical deck.

Although this is our first project, we have many years of experience managing various projects of various levels of complexity. In addition, we have consulted with experienced Kickstarters to learn from their wisdom and experience. Of course there are always hiccups with any project, but we've done everything we can to minimize those as much as possible.

Thank you so much for putting your trust in us!

story:
It All Started When ...

I accidentally wrote a 5E fantasy RPG adventure! Wanna help me print it? This is a short campaign ... it ends on June 16, 2017.

I started playing fantasy RPGs in 1982 at seven years old. (Yes, THAT fantasy RPG.) I accidentally stumbled into a career publishing supplements and adventures for THAT game along with designing RPG systems of my own. Check out my Goodreads page or visit my website for more info.

On my recent trip to Texas for a regional game convention I scribbled out two pages worth of adventure notes for 5th Edition of the world's oldest and most popular roleplaying game (yes, THAT one) and ran a few players through it before we packed up and drove back to Atlanta.

Then I sat down and ended up typing almost ten thousand words (26 pages worth of text in the manuscript writing program I use). I was originally thinking of posting this online via the DM's Guild, but ...

I really like it and I'd like to sell it in retail stores, not just online. I got a really talented cartographer to do the map and my illustrator I've worked with for more than a decade to draw the new monster type. It has a neat story, but is modular so it can be dropped into an existing sword & sorcery-style game or serve as the beginning of a more heroic fantasy campaign. The current plan is to assemble it as a 16-page saddle-stitched adventure module that's somewhat reminiscent of the old glory days of RPGs, but written in my voice with my own signature style.

I'd like to have a printed version to sell to folks in game stores, at conventions, and online. It's completely outside my product schedule and the budget for my little game company. So it's up to you (yes YOU) to figure out if that's gonna happen. If we reach our goal, we'll print at least a thousand copies and get it out to game stores. Otherwise we'll print smaller batch of products for backers to sell directly. No matter what, everyone will get what they pay for!

What's Already Done?

There is a complete manuscript that's already been through one rewrite and independent copyediting. Anyone who backs this will get a PDF of a fully playable version of this adventure within 48 hours of the campaign coming to a close! We also have a finalized adventure map and an illustration of the new monster that's a part of the scenario.

What Needs Finishing? The adventure needs typesetting and layout (which I can do myself and have already started tinkering with). And if we end up meeting the goal we'll need a piece of cover art, cover design, and maybe another piece of spot art to make a product ready for prime time. It will be published via the Open Game License through my company Signal Fire Studios . My products are sold into distribution and available in hobby game stores who choose to carry us.

Wait a minute, aren't you the guy who ... ?

Full disclosure: I have a mixed history with crowdfunding. While all three projects I've run in the past have funded and all three have sent out the primary product, things have been late and secondary rewards are something I'm still working to make good on. It's a long story mixed with bad luck and some poor choices on my part.

To mitigate that for this project I've got a few things in mind:

  • It's pretty much done. The manuscript is already written and revised. Whoever shells out a few bucks for this will get something they can use for their 5E game immediately, complete with map.
  • Reasonable goal, no crazy stretch goals. I'm not trying to make a lot of money off the crowdfunding, I just want to see if enough of you would like a cool 5E adventure to pay for us to make and print a nicer version than I initially planned.
  • Transparency. Anyone who backs the project will have access to an online spreadsheet that will reveal what I've paid for the project and when based on the actual funds received for it. I'm going to separate the funds from my normal company account so nothing will mingle until I hit a specific button to do so.

Stretch Goals

I said no "crazy" stretch goals. I have baked in a few that will be easy and fun to offer!

  • $2,000: I'll write up a full description of the town of Shadowhaven (tied to the adventure), complete with adventure seeds, NPCs, and include a map.
  • $2,500: I'll create a short eBook that includes author notes, tips on running the encounters, suggestions on portraying NPCs, and more. I'll make it easy to have up on a phone or tablet to reference on game night!

How Else Can I Help?

Spread the word. Share the pictures and videos! Game on!

Video Attribution:

Map by Owello | Cover Design by Digger Hayes 
Music: "On My Way" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ | "Send for the Horses" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
story_txt:
It All Started When ...
I accidentally wrote a 5E fantasy RPG adventure! Wanna help me print it? This is a short campaign ... it ends on June 16, 2017.I started playing fantasy RPGs in 1982 at seven years old. (Yes, THAT fantasy RPG.) I accidentally stumbled into a career publishing supplements and adventures for THAT game along with designing RPG systems of my own. Check out my Goodreads page or visit my website for more info.On my recent trip to Texas for a regional game convention I scribbled out two pages worth of adventure notes for 5th Edition of the world's oldest and most popular roleplaying game (yes, THAT one) and ran a few players through it before we packed up and drove back to Atlanta.

Then I sat down and ended up typing almost ten thousand words (26 pages worth of text in the manuscript writing program I use). I was originally thinking of posting this online via the DM's Guild, but ...

I really like it and I'd like to sell it in retail stores, not just online. I got a really talented cartographer to do the map and my illustrator I've worked with for more than a decade to draw the new monster type. It has a neat story, but is modular so it can be dropped into an existing sword & sorcery-style game or serve as the beginning of a more heroic fantasy campaign. The current plan is to assemble it as a 16-page saddle-stitched adventure module that's somewhat reminiscent of the old glory days of RPGs, but written in my voice with my own signature style.
I'd like to have a printed version to sell to folks in game stores, at conventions, and online. It's completely outside my product schedule and the budget for my little game company. So it's up to you (yes YOU) to figure out if that's gonna happen. If we reach our goal, we'll print at least a thousand copies and get it out to game stores. Otherwise we'll print smaller batch of products for backers to sell directly. No matter what, everyone will get what they pay for!
What's Already Done?
There is a complete manuscript that's already been through one rewrite and independent copyediting. Anyone who backs this will get a PDF of a fully playable version of this adventure within 48 hours of the campaign coming to a close! story:
The Calling is a deck-building game based around the Bible. It is not a retelling, but a fun ‘reliving’ of characters and their stories! It's a fast-paced (15-45 minute) game for ages 12 and up- focusing on the core ideas surrounding the faithful and courageous individuals found in the Bible. 

Players interact with each other in a world of callings and banes- trying to achieve their calling or garner the most influence, all while not succumbing to their banes.
​



 

We are doing this as a project of passion, not profit.  We only need a minimum order of 8 box sets to get the price point below, but the more we get the better we can make things.

If you have any questions, please check out the FAQ or ask us a question!


 

See below what you can help us unlock if we meet each Stretch Goal:




 We wanted a game that reminds us of the Bible, and the sagas, epics, and adventures therein.  A lot of times people think of the Bible as stale or old or dated... It doesn't pique the imagination like a lot of media does today. 

The Calling is a fun, simple to pick up, strategic card game that draws your imagination into a fantasy world without losing the Bible message.

Each card has a bible verse from its story and each story includes the major events and players of a story.  You can remember or teach the core concepts of a story by reading through the story's deck.

Our beliefs: We believe in the inerrant truth of the Bible and that it is the God inspired word.  We want to remind ourselves and those who play this, that it can be fun to learn about, think about, and imagine about the Bible and the callings of those who are in it.

 

If $32 / $18 / $10 / a world with 1 less Venti Frappuccino™  sounds steep: try connecting with your community on our behalf!  Ask your Youth Pastor / Bible study leader / geeky nerfherder friend to check us out!  The worst that could happen is they buy it and you get to play at their place! That's all there is to it.
​

This is Indiegogo.  This is a campaign.  Things happen.  That said: we have done our research, and production is as simple as uploading our designs and placing an order, checking for quality, building each individual box set, and shipping them out to you.  The major hurdle is getting enough boxes to break even, and then if things scale heavily, the hurdle will be boxing and shipping a bunch of games in a timely and quality fashion.

Logistically, it will take some time to develop and ship everything, and our FAQ will address numbers more specifically for how long it will take to get your perk.

story:
Revilo began as a backdrop for the creatures I was sculpting with intentions to create a world that my son could collaborate on. Over time this setting grew as the lore expanded, so did the adventuring party who helped breathe life into it. Teamed with Isaac Skaggs and Carey Drake, we created a campaign setting and bestiary for others to play in. 

People around the globe have already begun to bring their adventures into Revilo! It has been amazing to hear their stories and how they are now telling their own stories in the world I created. 

Now we want more people to share in the excitement. All items are currently in production and they are looking fantastic! Check out a flip through of the printed books.

 

 

Why Now?

We hit a snag in production where the acrylic pawns went up significantly in price. Rather than change what we had already promised to our supporters, we are hoping to raise more funds to help cover the extra expense.

All of the funds previously raised had already been accounted for with paying for production and paying the team that worked on the book. 

We are trying to raise $3,000 to cover the extra expenses we have incurred. To larger companies that may not seem like a lot, but for a small company like us, it is huge.

In the past 30 years humans, elves, and dwarves have crashed onto the coast of Revilo, discovering a land the other side of the world had never seen. One human has built an army and hired the vile, marauding Greyskrulls to aid him on his conquests. Will the rest of Revilo be able to form an alliance before this army conquers them? Will the gods wake from hibernation to keep their people safe? 

While the outlanders try to find their way in this new land, a revered sect of 18, known as the Keepers of Secrets, are slowly being hunted down by a new cult. Inside each of the Keepers of Secrets is a fragment of the evil god Ghyrma. The Keepers of Secrets fear that this new cult is collecting these pieces to try and resurrect the long-forsaken god.  

Inhabitants of Revilo – Playable Races  

Here's a list of all the perks we're currently offering:

Revilo Bestiary Deck 1 & 2. Each Bestiary card deck contains 44 tarot-sized reference cards of monsters in the Bestiary book! Quickly share the monsters in gameplay while keeping stats hidden from the players. There are 2 volumes to contain all of the beasts! 

Get access to our fully designed Printable PDFs of the World of Revilo: Campaign Setting, Revilo Bestiary, and printable monster cards.

The hardcover World of Revilo Campaign Setting book contains 138 pages of setting, playable races, backgrounds, sub-classes, and story arcs unique to Revilo! 

Book dimensions are 8.5" x 11". Comes with the Printable PDF of this book.

The hardcover Revilo Bestiary book contains 110 pages of monsters unique to Revilo! 

Book dimensions are 8.5" x 11". Comes with the Printable PDF of this book.  

Revilo Bestiary Box of Pawns 1 or 2. Each Bestiary Box contains 44 clear plastic pawns, each with their own base, that are 2mm thick! Add the monsters to your tabletop experience with these standard size beasts. There are 2 different volumes to contain all of the beasts! Box 1 matches Deck 1, Box 2 matches Deck 2. 

With these two books you will have everything you need to run a fully immersive campaign set in Revilo!  Comes with access to our fully designed Printable PDFs of the World of Revilo: Campaign Setting, Revilo Bestiary, and printable monster cards. 

You are a true explorer of Revilo! Not only will get the two books, you will also receive both bestiary decks of monsters and their accompanying acrylic pawn sets! Your tabletop game will come alive with all of these creatures from Revilo!  Comes with access to our fully designed Printable PDFs of the World of Revilo: Campaign Setting, Revilo Bestiary, and printable monster cards. 

You are a true Revilan! Not only do you get everything in the Explorer Set, but you also get the slipcase, GM Screen (final art not done yet), dice, and map!

story:
Short Summary

Hey there, sonny! I'm BOBEYO! I'm immortal, live at the north pole, own the entire world, and all of the countries pay me taxes. And if you piss me off, I WILL KILL YOU.

This is a card game about me and some other idiots who don't matter, like my worthless computer hacker son Edddeyo (he added the third D when video games went 3-D), and Cocky Bob, who is my other worthless son who thinks he's cool. There's also my sort of enemy, the MOON GOD, who isn't really my enemy because I honestly don't care if he uses his army of idiots on rampage to destroy the world. That's his business. I'm too busy killing off my insane clones and avoiding my nagging wife Sueyo, who always tries to feed me $&%@# Brussels sprouts. I hate Brussels sprouts!

Anyway, this awesome card game is so simple even you morons could figure it out! Just draw cards out of the pile and do stuff that's written on them. If you get a full set of "Collect 4" cards, like Rare Cheeses or Bobeyo Clones, you win! You also win if you survive longer than anyone else by avoiding me, ANGRY BOBEYO! If you draw me, I get pissed off and kill you. Use other cards to avoid me, trick other players into drawing me, and collect the winning cards!

What We Need & What You Get

It's really simple:

  • The game is ALREADY COMPLETELY DESIGNED, barring any last-minute changes. We just need your help funding the first printing of it, so we can sell it!
  • Once it's printed, we ship your rewards! You get a copy of the card game, plus other goodies depending on your reward level! Here are some details about the rewards:
  • The Game: This is the physical card game. It consists of 56 playing cards in a fancy cardboard box with an instruction booklet!
  • The Card: A personalized Thank You card for our top backers, signed by all 3 creators (Justin, Ryan, and Maegan), with a Bobeyo drawing by Justin just for you!
  • The Minifigure: This is a customized LEGO® minifigure based on Bobeyo. Please note that LEGO® is a trademark of The LEGO Group, which does not sponsor, authorize, or endorse this product.

Mock-up images of some of the rewards (the box, signed greeting card, and minifigure)
with 5 example cards!

Risks & Challenges

Again, barring last-minute edits, the design phase of the game is ALREADY FINISHED! So the only problems that might arise would be from the manufacturing. We will keep our backers fully updated on manufacturing progress and any hiccups along the way. The rewards will ship to you as soon as the finished game is in our hands.

Why flexible funding? Because if we can't reach the full goal amount, we will just have to order fewer copies of the game than planned, or fund the rest some other way. But we WILL make this game!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can help by spreading the word! We always - always - appreciate help with promotion. Please share our campaign on social media, or just tell your friends!

Stretch Goals

If we exceed our goals, we have plenty of ideas for how to spend the extra funds! In fact, while we were designing Bobeyo, I came up with an idea for another game that I would love to get off the ground...

If we raise more money than required, maybe some of our backers will get an extra game! But we'll talk more about that later, if we start to get close...

About Us

We are three siblings: Justin, Ryan, and Maegan Stebbins. Click on our names to visit our websites. We came up with Bobeyo together when we were kids, constantly inventing crazy new elements of his universe. This is our way of introducing him to the world. Enjoy!

story:
Short Summary

The Red Raven Inn is charity project with all net proceeds donated to Children’s Mercy Hospital.

This project was is the work of a team of 15 writers and illustrators collaborating to create a new and unique campaign setting book compatible with the Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition game under the Open-Gaming License (OGL). Contained in this book new content including player races styled after American bison and coyotes, spells, character backgrounds, political centers, monsters a fortress, illustrations and more. This is an open source project where participants volunteered their time and ideas to collaboratively develop this new content.

What We Need & What You Get

The content for this project has already been created and is currently finishing editing before being sent to the print shop. The book will be at least 100 pages of new content. You can purchase a printed book, a PDF or both.

You can attend a book release party at Pawn & Pint, Kansas City, Missouri’s first board game café, when the printed books are available. This is an optional event not included in your purchase of the items in this Indiegogo campaign. Details of the book release party will be provided to backers near the end of the project. This will be an opportunity to meet the writers and illustrators who contributed to this project.

The funds from this project will pay for the printing and shipping of the book. Writers and illustrators volunteered their content and were not compensated for their contributions.

The 5th Edition Player's Handbook, Dungeon Master's Guide, and Monster Manual published by Wizards of the Coast are required to play this game. The content in this Indiegogo campaign is a supplement to the Dungeons & Dragons rules published in those three books.

This content is published under the Open-Gaming License (OGL) maintained by Wizards of the Coast. You can find additional information about the OGL at the following link.

https://dnd.wizards.com/articles/features/syste...

The Impact

Your contributions to this campaign will provide funds used to buy games for children receiving care at Children’s Mercy Hospital in the Kansas City, Missouri metropolitan area.

This project is also the first time content has been published for many of the writers and illustrators who volunteered their content. Most of the writers and artists who contributed to this project did not know eachother before the start of the content collaboration sessions, and many new friendships have formed as a result of this project.

Risks & Challenges

This project will be completed.

While this is the first crowd-sourced campaign for the creator of this project, this is not the first campaign for some of the contributors to this project. These contributors provided their guidance during this project to ensure this project was successful.

The goal for this campaign is set to a low amount to ensure the Indiegogo campaign is successful. We already have enough interest that this minimum goal should be met.

The main risk to this project is the printing schedule. The print shop has quoted two weeks to print the books after they receive the content yet there could be unforeseen delays

Shipping delays is another risk. Shipping fulfillment for this project will be conducted by volunteers and unexpected and large success could result in brief delays to some orders.

Social Media

Additional information about this project can be found at the following social media links.

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/groups/StoriesFromTheR...

Twitter
https://twitter.com/RedRavenStories

Writers and illustrators volunteered their content and were not compensated for their contributions.The 5th Edition Player's Handbook, Dungeon Master's Guide, and Monster Manual published by Wizards of the Coast are required to play this game. The content in this Indiegogo campaign is a supplement to the Dungeons & Dragons rules published in those three books.This content is published under the Open-Gaming License (OGL) maintained by Wizards of the Coast. You can find additional information about the OGL at the following link.https://dnd.wizards.com/articles/features/syste...The ImpactYour contributions to this campaign will provide funds used to buy games for children receiving care at Children’s Mercy Hospital in the Kansas City, Missouri metropolitan area.This project is also the first time content has been published for many of the writers and illustrators who volunteered their content. Most of the writers and artists who contributed to this project did not know eachother before the start of the content collaboration sessions, and many new friendships have formed as a result of this project.Risks & ChallengesThis project will be completed.While this is the first crowd-sourced campaign for the creator of this project, this is not the first campaign for some of the contributors to this project. These contributors provided their guidance during this project to ensure this project was successful.The goal for this campaign is set to a low amount to ensure the Indiegogo campaign is successful. We already have enough interest that this minimum goal should be met.The main risk to this project is the printing schedule. The print shop has quoted two weeks to print the books after they receive the content yet there could be unforeseen delaysShipping delays is another risk. Shipping fulfillment for this project will be conducted by volunteers and unexpected and large success could result in brief delays to some orders.Social MediaAdditional information about this project can be found at the following social media links.Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/groups/StoriesFromTheR...Twitterhttps://twitter.com/RedRavenStories

story:
One of the gaming industry's biggest and most beloved #RPG gaming systems has decades-worth of rich characters, stories, and details that keep fans playing. 

Dynamite has spent the last several years expanding the world of Pathfinder® with comic books and additional gaming materials but, for the first time on Kickstarter, we have teamed up with Paizo to offer fans the very first statue featuring one of Pathfinder®’s most recognized heroes.

Dynamite offers fans discounted pricing on every statue pre-order!

Standing approximately 12” high, this very limited-edition statue series is cast in high-quality resin, and comes hand painted with diligent attention to detail. Even her many tattoos have been meticulously recreated with seamless decal work.

WHO IS SEONI?

The formidable human sorcerer, Seoni, is a woman of few words, and that often results in surprises for her adversaries who underestimate her brilliant cunning. Compelled by her strict moral code and compulsive preparation, she makes an ideal member for any band of adventurers. This is what makes Seoni one of Pathfinder’s most popular Iconic Heroes, and the reason why Dynamite has chosen to celebrate her in resin form for the very first time in Pathfinder history!

STATUS

This statue is already produced and on it's way from China. We expect the statues to be in our fulfillment warehouse in early August where fulfillment will begin.

story:
Our Story

Hello! Zodi-Kay here. Ash Bonnelli and I founded the ZODI [“zoh-dee”] Collective to bring astrology into an whole new dimension.

ZODI is the first of its kind. There is no other product out there for exploring astrology and charts through a systematic deck of cards and chart diagram mat. By backing our campaign, you will be helping bring something truly unique to the astrology market: an entirely new way to discover astrology.

Transcend the traditional one-on-one, two-dimensional experience of astrology with ZODI. Hold it in your hands or move it around on the ZODI Map. ZODI makes exploring astrology a kinesthetic experience. Share it with friends at a dinner party, explore it with your partner on a weekend away or even bring it to work for a team-building exercise. ZODI brings astrology into real life relationships. It's now a group activity!

Bring your astrology readings into a new dimension, ZODI brings astro charts to life. The symbols/glyphs translated in archetypal images and color make the building blocks of astrology tangible and relatable. Birth, transit, and compatability charts, now in card form, layer and move around on the ZODI Map!

 

 

My years of practicing psychotherapy have shown me again and again, the life-changing impact of knowing ourselves more deeply and how we fit in the larger order of things. Enriching our self-understanding in this way can make deeper connections with others possible, and allow us to bring our unique brand of positive change to the world. Ash's years of experience in the healing arts, photography and practicing astrology give her a perspective through which to see astrology and photography as conduits for healing in the world.

Together, Ash and I share the belief that astrology brings the unique gift of self-understanding for individuals, their relationships and communities. We feel that presenting this star theory in an entirely new, engaging and approachable format could help more people experience the benefits. We created the ZODI project from this vision.

After more than 14 months of business planning and development, product design and focus groups, we are ready to reach out to YOU for help funding the first production run of the ZODI Deck, Guidebook and Map! Thanks for being here. We hope you will join us in this groundbreaking campaign by pre-ordering a product perk or backing our campaign with a donation.

Our Goal

We need your help to raise $20,500.
After IGG fees, these dollars will go directly to production of our initial, minimum order batch of 500 units of ZODI Decks, Guidebooks and Maps ($18,833 including taxes and sea freight shipping.)

Our ZODI products are designed to last with heavy use, and as a result we have selected high quality, durable materials. Held in the hand, the ZODI Deck's 154-card count is roughly twice the size of a Tarot deck and two to three times that of an average oracle deck. Production costs reflect the sheer size of the deck, the number of products we're batch producing (deck, guidebook and map) and the durable materials used. Although our goal is significant, it is the minimum necessary to successfully bring our first edition of the ZODI collection to market.

To date, we've invested just under $21,000 in resources to develop the business foundation - form our corporation and secure US trademark registration, design our brand and ZODI products and launch our ecommerce website.

With this campaign, we are reaching out to you, the Indiegogo community, to boost our efforts and help take ZODI the final step of the way.

 

 

ZODI Perks!

Our perks are the ZODI products themselves. Check them out in more detail on the sidebar, but below is a brief overview.

We are offering our early supporters special pricing on our ZODI Bundle (Deck, Guidebook and Map) for the first 48 hours of the campaign, and Ultimate ZODI Collection (Deck, Guidebook, Map and Tote) for the duration of the campaign.

The ZODI Deck is a brand-new way to experience your astrology. Get to know yourself through exploration of your planets and their relationships with one another. Discover themes and energies that lie ahead through exploring transit charts. Illuminate relationship potentials, strengths and challenges through exploration of astro compatibility with your closest people. ZODI makes all of this tangible. Included with the deck, our ZODI Guidebook contains gems of information about the components of astrology and guidance on how to use your deck.

The ZODI Map (sold separately) is an invaluable tool for using your cards to bring astrological charts to life. Birth charts, transit charts, compatibility charts…It all happens on our 24”x24” soft rubber, non-slip mat with a smooth surface printed with the zodiac wheel. It the perfect foundation for exploration!

We have also created the ZODI Tote (sold separately) for all your ZODI gear. This mid-weight, gusseted canvas tote bag holds it all. Have Tote...ZODI will travel!

If you’d like to experience ZODI with its creators, we’re offering a couple special perks: ZODI astrology readings with Ash, and ZODI parties, where we will come to your house and lead fun ZODI experiences with you and six of your friends - each person receives a deck and guidebook.

The traditional astro reading...

The ZODI astro reading!

 

Why is ZODI worth backing?

ZODI is the first of its kind.

There is no other product out there for exploring astrology and charts through a systematic deck of cards and chart diagram mat. By backing our campaign, you will be helping bring something truly unique to the astrology market.

ZODI is engaging for all.

The ZODI format will make learning more about astrology interactive and fun for beginners, and bring a new dimension to professional astrological readings, coaching sessions, or even organizational team building workshops. Whether you're an astro novice or seasoned professional, ZODI has something illuminating to offer.

 

 

ZODI can foster self-discovery and connection with others.

Astrology is a theory - a system - through which we can find meaning in our lives, discover more about ourselves and bridge connections between ourselves and others. Our goal in creating ZODI is to bring this star theory to more people and experience oneself through its fascinating lens.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Being the first of its kind, ZODI doesn’t have truly comparable competitor products. However, in exploring other card deck (Tarot and oracle deck) crowd fund campaigns, our funding goal is higher than most.

Having put the time, work and resources toward creating ZODI's business foundations and completing the design and branding, the ZODI collection is complete and ready for production. We have jumped many hurdles and put our plans in place for going forward.

The main remaining hurdle we foresee will be raising the funds necessary for our initial production batch. We need your help to get there!

 

Why We Can Succeed

We are uniquely poised to launch ZODI.

I have launched two successful businesses over the past 12 years (a psychotherapy private practice and web design business) while Ash has launched her own business as a practicing astrologer, has 15+ years experience in the healing arts and endless creativity. We are both passionate about deepening the greater understanding of astrology and have put significant time and resources into setting ZODI up for success.

We have galvanized ZODI with protections for our brand design and products through US trademark registration, and operations for the business as a licensed corporation. In addition to these solid business and legal foundations necessary to launch our ZODI products, we have focused earnestly on building a trusted and compelling brand reputation.

Our well-framed general business plan, as well as specific development and promotional plans for 2019 and beyond, inform our stages as we learn and dynamically grow the ZODI enterprise.

We are committed to continually learning what is needed to create, launch, bring to market and maintain a thriving product. We are also willing to put in the work necessary to make these things happen.

Ways We’ve Mitigated Risk

We've followed Indiegogo’s recommendations for launching and managing a successful campaign. We gathered an advisory committee that served as a focus group for our ZODI products and business plan; the group also provided strategic support for this campaign. We have reinforcements!

We have also spent several months developing our brand and reputation on social media platforms and realized an audience that fits into the larger communities of astrology, philosophy and healing arts. We are ready to engage these communities in reaching our goal!

 

What if this campaign falls short of its goal?

If we don’t reach our campaign goal, the fundraising doesn’t end here. All campaign funds (minus Indiegogo fees) raised will go directly to production. Our designs are complete and our vendors standing by, ready to go! We will continue securing funds until production is possible – as soon as possible. Your funds will remain earmarked for your pre-order until the time we are ready for fulfillment!

We will keep you updated and are happy to address any questions you have along the way. Just get in touch!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We hope you will feel inspired to join us in bringing this ZODI baby into the world. Pre-ordering perks and/or making a donation to back our campaign are great ways to get involved, however these aren’t the only ways to make a positive impact for this campaign.

You can support our campaign even without pre-ordering or donating. Sharing ZODI with folks you know who might be curious and/or interested will be a huge help! Circulating this campaign link on social media and telling your astrology-curious friends about ZODI is easy with Indiegogo’s share tools.

Thanks for your interest in ZODI, and checking out our campaign!
Thanks, too, for your support of independent projects made possible through Indiegogo!

- Zodi-Kay & Ash

story:
Stellar Kingdoms is a creative reimagining of the ordinary playing cards in an original Sci-Fi setting. Immerse yourself in the Age of Discovery across the vast reaches of breathtaking space, with daring heroes and formidable villains - the art of Stellar Kingdoms is based on the known tropes of adventure movies, games and novels, and seamlessly blend with the traditional game card style. Welcome to the new world - the world of Stellar Kingdoms! 

In Stellar Kingdoms, each of the four suits is an original fraction with its own backstory, character and aspirations. Their identities make the battleground on the card table more dramatic and exciting!

Loyal to traditions, the Hearts have brought the medieval swords and crowns across the centuries into the Space Age. Honorable and fair, the Star Knights aspire to bringing peace and prosperity to the Galaxy, yet never hesitate to confront injustice and the forces of evil.

Having perfected the art of intrigue, the Diamonds conquer the vastness of deep space by utilizing delicate calculation and filigreed trickery. Putting their impressive wealth to use, this fraction carefully undermines the game balance by manipulating the others.

The incarnate of humanity’s fears, the Spades are the merciless inhabitants of the undead world on their quest of consolidating all Star Kingdoms under the power of their terror. No compromise and no negotiations - nothing short of a complete annihilation of the enemy.

In their aspiration for balance, the Clubs operate strictly by cold-blooded calculation. Nothing personal - devoid of passions and flaws, they measure their every step, keeping their loyalty to impeccable logic and accurate mathematical planning.

In their conflict, the four fractions of Stellar Kingdoms create a perfect balance - eternal confrontation that moves the game forward. The playing cards unlock infinite potential, and this infinity is reflected in the stylish black and white back of our deck.

Printed by UNITED STATES PLAYING CARD COMPANY with MetalLuxe™ technology

I always liked playing cards. Poker, bridge, blackjack - whatever we play, we always feel the spike of adrenaline - the thrill of walking on the edge with a successful bluff, almost sexual pleasure from a careful calculation paying off… Cards have long become something more than just a bunch of painted pieces of cardboard. And one day I caught myself thinking that I admire the faces of the Kinds, Queens and Jacks, that I enjoy coming up with their backstory, characters, aspirations and dreams.

It’s simple really - I didn’t wish to accept that the cards were indifferent to the skirmish that went on the table. The more worldbuilding there is behind the cards, the higher the immersion, and hence excitement and joy.

This idea was fused with my admiration of science fiction and fantasy, epic adventures and conflicts, romantic drama and incredible dangers. This kind of stories gifts us bright emotions just like we experience behind a card table. And today I’m finally ready to invite all of you to Stellar Kingdoms - welcome to the galaxy where all four suits are factions of an infinite conflict.

story:
Organic Enigmas - The Cellular Puzzles

Plant and Animal Cell puzzles

Explore the very basics of life in this brand new series of jigsaw puzzles! Put the building blocks of life together one piece at a time.

-detail of Animal Cell

High resolution images created by world renowned scientific illustrator Russell Kightley. The images are printed at 800 dpi directly onto the surface of the wood. Never have to worry about pieces fraying on the edges or the paper separating from the backing. Each organic piece is a work of art on it's own.

 

Discover clever shapes utilized as actual pieces within the puzzles themselves.

 

 

Find the path of human evolution in the Animal Cell.

Discover Large internal secondary puzzles

 

Arguably the most unique features are the "secret" puzzles. Small, multi-piece puzzles cleverly scattered throughout.

You'll need the included map to find the correct pieces to make up the secret puzzles.

 

Two sizes to choose from. The larger puzzles measure 18" x 16" and have a total piece count of 350. A good challenge for anyone!

The smaller puzzles measure  8" x 10" and include all the secret puzzles and figural pieces that the larger puzzles have. The only things that differentiate them from the larger ones is the piece count (130) and the absent larger internal puzzles (the tree in the Plant Cell and the DNA helix in the Animal Cell). The small Animal Cell puzzle also has a smaller, 3 piece human evolution chain.

story:
Welcome and thank you for visiting our campaign page!


Short Summary


Do you want to have a unique army with a non-generic theme?

Not another orc-elf-human army...

You do not wish to spend a lot on the army?

We might have a solution for you.

Couple of years ago I saw an army made of simple rocks. I liked it a lot, but I wanted more than stones with painted on eyes. I started to tinker about this idea and after many years, the idea is now a real thing.

First I wanted the rock army just for myself along with my own ideas. I wanted to use them for Warhammer Fantasy and Kings of War.

First I wanted to do them from real stones, but then I met someone who was proficient in sculpting and who also loved the idea of living rocks.

Several people told me, that if I do the army with him, why not share with others too? As I am good at resin casting, now I open the opportunity for others too via the crowdfunding campaign.


Who we are

I am Daniel. I already participated in several campaings already as resin caster. I work with resin and you can see lot of my work on my FB page.
www.facebook.com/sebitarworkshop
www.facebook.com/28mmrockarmy
The whole thing would have stayed just an idea, if I do not meet László. He is an excellent sculptor. 
www.facebook.com/neverrealm

Gergely is helping us to promote the campaign. He is running Gregster's Lab
www.facebook.com/gregsters6mm
What We Need 

With this campaign we wish to collect funds to buy all the resin and the rubber for the molding and perhaps to build one more pressure chamber. 

As we reach stretch goals, we can include even more models and add bonus items for the contributors.

What You Get

Below you will find the list of perks available in the campaign

Rock Army Battleforce:

1 warrior character  (with 25x25mm plastic base)

20 small rock warriors (with 20x20mm plastic bases)

10 medium rock warriors (with 25x25mm plastic bases)

Character (warrior):

1 warrior character  (with 25x25mm plastic base)


Small Rock Squad:

20 small rock warriors (with 20x20mm plastic bases)
10 are different sculpts (2 each).


Medium Rock Squad:

10 medium rock warriors (with 25x25mm plastic bases)
All 10 are different sculpts.


Extra units available as perks

We decided to make all sculpts we have available for order. 
The Warl(R)ock


Rolling Rock Riders
5 mounted rock riders

Mounted Character


Big Roxx

3 big roxx on 40mm bases

Silent Giants
towering rock giants on 50x50mm base

Rock Artillery
One rock cannon and crew.


Painted examples




Risks & Challenges

The delays we calculated with might come from the shortage of casting material, technical problems. To avoid most of these we try to have more than one source and will have multiple pressure chambers to be able to work even if one or two might fail. Even if there is an overwhelming interest, we think we can adjust the production by setting up even more pressure chambers.
We already have the sculpts done and casting these can start when the campaign starts.

We will have help with the packing and posting, so if everything is done, we will pump out as many packages as possible per day. We will use registered shipping only to avoid untraceable, lost packages.


Other Ways You Can Help

f you do not need any angry stone men, we appreciate if you share the page for others who might like it.
story_txt:
Welcome and thank you for visiting our campaign page!



Short Summary

Do you want to have a unique army with a non-generic theme?

Not another orc-elf-human army...

You do not wish to spend a lot on the army?
We might have a solution for you.

Couple of years ago I saw an army made of simple rocks. I liked it a lot, but I wanted more than stones with painted on eyes. I started to tinker about this idea and after many years, the idea is now a real thing. 
First I wanted the rock army just for myself along with my own ideas. I wanted to use them for Warhammer Fantasy and Kings of War.
First I wanted to do them from real stones, but then I met someone who was proficient in sculpting and who also loved the idea of living rocks. 
Several people told me, that if I do the army with him, why not share with others too? As I am good at resin casting, now I open the opportunity for others too via the crowdfunding campaign.




Who we areI am Daniel. I already participated in several campaings already as resin caster. I work with resin and you can see lot of my work on my FB page.www.facebook.com/sebitarworkshopwww.facebook.com/28mmrockarmy
The whole thing would have stayed just an idea, if I do not meet László. He is an excellent sculptor. www.facebook.com/neverrealm
Gergely is helping us to promote the campaign. He is running Gregster's Lab
www.facebook.com/gregsters6mm

What We Need 

With this campaign we wish to collect funds to buy all the resin and the rubber for the molding and perhaps to build one more pressure chamber. 
As we reach stretch goals, we can include even more models and add bonus items for the contributors.

Extra units available as perks

5 mounted rock riders
Mounted Character




Big Roxx3 big roxx on 40mm bases

towering rock giants on 50x50mm base

One rock cannon and crew.



 Painted examples
