story:
A homebrew fantasy world and miniatures, which includes many custom races, cultures, monsters, and all new campaign adventures. Our kickstarter centers on creating a world and characters that inspire the type of creative and memorable adventures that we all strive to produce in our fantasy RPG and tabletop settings. 

Special Thanks to Miguel Zavala, the prolific 3D sculptor of models for fantasy TTRPGs, for always being such a huge creative contributor to the community. Some of his miniature designs were the inspiration for some of our miniatures, while some of his models have been modified to fit the theme of this Kickstarter. Thanks Miguel! Please check out his Patreon for the biggest miniature 3D model repository today.

Gather your friends for a new campaign in Sol’an, featuring the Heroes of Sol’an miniatures from Wild Spire as optional playable characters. Sol’an provides a new world and story in which to adventure, whether a unique journey for your established campaign or a starting point for a new group of gamers.

Our campaign setting provides a detailed description of the geography, culture, cities, empires, and everything you need to know about Sol’an and Solreem’on. Follow our suggestions, or modify the world to fit your current campaign.

Sol’an, a world caught halfway between the Blessed Fields of Elysium, the idyllic plane of absolute neutral good, and the dark void beyond, has fallen into constant turmoil. The forces for good, led by the Sunguard Paladins of Pelor, must be ever ready to defend the Nations of Light from the darkness that encroaches across the Barrier Sea to the south. In the north, the empires of goodly races are bathed in the warming light of Pelor, with the Sunguard Cathedral centrally resting atop the Golden Peak Mountains. In the south, monster cities led by evil denizens outlie the massive crater that swallows the southern pole. 

Sunguard Cathedral in the Gold Peak Mountains, center of worship to the Sun-deity, Pelor

The ever churning darkness is a constant reminder of a historical battle nearly a century ago. For Bel the Warlord, archdevil in service to Asmodeus, was angry he lost his top rank to Zariel, the new ruler of Avernus. He hoped to present the ruined heavenly world of Sol’an to his master to regain his position as Asmodeus’ champion, but his conquest was ultimately ended by the heroic actions of both the Sunguard Paladins of Pelor and local champions. Since then, the darkness remains behind, scarring the southern lands and providing fiends haven from Pelor’s light. The Nations of Light remain vigilant and prepared, knowing that the dark storm may one day return to claim the light from Sol’an.

Gorespire, Orc Fortress, near the epicenter of evil in the south

Our story begins in the equatorial trade town of Boiler Bay. This trade haven is carved out of the tall bluffs along the southern coast of Solreem’on, the large continent named after the elven kingdom within the Sol’reem forest canopy. The limited Sunguard presence primarily focuses on defending the harbor from forces of evil that occasionally emerge from the depths of Boiler Bay. As such, the town council actively relies on mercenary heroes to answer the complaints of citizens and management of order. Enter the hero troupes of the Last Hope, a mercenary guild tasked investigating and enforcing order among the populace. Training has just wrapped up for a new group of guild recruits, perhaps heroes who will one day purge Sol’an of the churning darkness.

Boiler Bay and Evil swelling over the horizon

Townsfolk and NPCs

Townsfolk Character Sheets

To provide additional story development and world enrichment, the 18 short quest modules for our Sol'an campaign will integrate our Heroic Townsfolk into the Sol'an world. These adventures will cover Levels 1-10 and are designed to break up any main plot-lines or background stories, providing a diverse and dynamic gaming environment for your gamers.

 

Meet the Heroes of Sol'an

Each of the hero miniatures was meticulously designed to inspire the level of creativity that we all wish our RPG campaigns to enable. 

These heroes represent a specific race, culture, and ethnicity within the world of Sol'an, and each characterized by a set of unique traits.  Follow our character creation suggestions to unlock the full potential of both the miniature and the character within Sol'an.   

Order of the Drunken Fist: Typically jovial and laid-back, they are tempered  by their disciplined devotion to martial arts.  A work-hard, play-hard attitude manifests in ale ingestion and rigorous training regiments. 

Dragonborn Lightsworn: Earnest, serious, and often found in quiet contemplation. Their pious worship of Pelor and vanquishing evil eclipses most other priorities in their lives.

Tiefling Outlanders: Reclusive, self-sufficient, and deadly mercenaries. Many tieflings in Sol'an find themselves on the fringe of society due to being shunned for their devilish heritage. They are wanderers and think little of established social order. 

Half-Orcs: Similar to many tieflings, they are sometimes discriminated against for their orc blood. Nevertheless, their love of crafting and domestic arts often makes them indispensable in many circles. 

Pandakin: Native to the eastern Devil's Bluff Mountains of Solreem'on, Pandakin lives revolve around first their family, then the harmony of their village and nature. They do not complicate their lives with technology, but focus on the simple things. 

Mousefolk:  Ambitious adventurers dispersed to almost all corners of the Sol'an, as their wanderlust and ability to avoid notice allows them to explore many places other cannot. 

Barren Isles Minotaurs: Native to the archipelago east of Solreem'on, they pride themselves in their ability to enjoy the moment and to find a smile in any situation. Beware, they are capable of frightening violence when you threaten what they love.

Halflings of Carn: This legendary lineage of halflings are the feature of many heroic tales. Renowned for their valor and tenacity in battle, despite their size, their wits often help them prevail.  

Disciples of Sron: A society of technology worshippers that use the latest advancements in both science and magic to enhance their lives and  bodies for the purpose of fighting evil. 

Tribal Leonal: Prioritize family and faith, rejecting advanced civilization and large crowds. Overall, this race holds the respect of all within Elysium and surrounding worlds, often seen as the unofficial leaders of the angelic guardinal races.

Dark Touched Lupinal: With mind and faith are untainted, they have plunged themselves into battling evil in the southlands, where the light loses its strength. Their time away from the light has undoubtedly changed them. Lupinal are touted for their agility and finesse, as well as their powerful tracking ability through scent.   

Moonlight's Vengeance: A troupe of wizards actively engaged in rooting out evil forces in Solreem'on. Defined by a clear hierarchy, these wizards tend to be tirelessly studious and devoted to discovering magical secrets to thwart evil. 

The Firefly Troupe: Strong leaders and combat strategists. These elite warriors of the elven sanctuary of Firefly Grotto are assertive and skilled in combining magic and non-magic party members' abilities to find creative solutions in battle.

Druids of Galfarum: Residing near the southeast dwarven stronghold of Galfarum, these druids commune with nature and are a wealth of knowledge related to nature's bounty. 

Catfolk Magi: Social, clever, and always ready for naps. Catfolk are found in moderate number in most regions of Sol'an, and excel at magic.

The Animals of Sol'an

The animals of Sol'an are also cognizant of the encroaching evil and often join forces with the Heroes to curb the growing dark forces.

Monsters of Sol'an

The landscapes of Sol'an allow for the use of nearly all monster compendiums, specifically allowing for creatures of great heavenly power to intervene in worldly affairs as well as massive fiends of pure darkness. Below are just of the few of the monsters you can expect to encounter within our pre-made adventures. 

 

Sample Level 1 Adventure: Ratmen in the sewers!

Throw your newly created heroes directly into action, as the Last Hope mercenary guild has its first assignment.  This quick excursion into the sewers below the harbor district of Boiler Bay features a dynamic encounter involving custom ratmen monsters!

All material is published under the Open Games License v1.0a and the SRD-OGL v5.1, The Hypertext d20 SRD, Creative Commons Sharealike 1.0 by Wordpress.com and ObsidianPortal.com

 

Overview of the rewards are available so far:

 

The Campaign Setting

Test-player Testimonial:

"Our group has been playing in this setting, going through the quest modules Colin has been preparing. The custom races are cool as hell, and have been a blast to play. I am really enjoying my Dark-Touched lupinal sorcerer, and the storyline so far is well written and exciting." - Justin

  • Receive a 50+ page Digital PDF of  the fleshed out fantasy world of Sol'an, complete with 15+ custom peoples (cultures, races, ethnicities, societies, etc). To also include GM guidance for campaigns in Sol'an, as well as a level 1 adventure.
  • High-resolution world, regional, and city maps of of Sol'an in (digital), print-friendly format.
  • 100+ hours of meticulously crafted gameplay , spanning 18+  short quest modules (levels 1 - 10) featuring the Wild Spire Heroic Townsfolk miniatures. Access the 18 Wild Spire Heroic Townsfolk Character Sheets and stat-blocks.
  • 10+ original monsters complete with descriptions, stat-blocks, and artwork
  • Digital Campaign Setting Book

 

The Miniatures:

  •  28 (25 core minis + 3 stretch goals) high-quality plastic miniatures (15 Heroes and 13 Animals) unpainted, 28mm scale

  • Background Reference Sheets for each of the 28 miniatures. 

  •  3D model files (STL format) are available for all 28 miniatures in select Reward Tiers

 

Hero Miniatures

 

Animal Miniatures 

Extras

 

To add any of the extras to your order:

Increase your perk amount by the amount listed next to the add-on

You may add multiple copies of any of the extras 

Thank you for your support!

story:
ORDERS ARE BEING DELIVERED!!

It has been hard... design has been changed, reviewed and improved. It take more time than expected and promised, but finally we get it. Thank you to all the backers for wait patiently!!

¡¡ESTAMOS ENTREGANDO LOS PEDIDOS!!

Ha sido difícil... los diseños han cambiado, han sido revisados, y mejorados. Ha cogido mucho más tiempo que el esperado y el prometido, pero finalmente, lo conseguimos. ¡Gracias a todos los contribuyentes por vuestra paciente espera!

 

Get all the accessories from the ACCESSORIES campaign!!
¡Consigue todos los accesorios desde la campaña de ACCESORIOS!

 

 

Promotional and description videos

 

 

Perks description and plates assembly / Descripción de contribuciones y montaje de láminas

 

 

New! weathering technics and colour plates description / ¡Nuevo! Técnicas de envejecimiento y descripción de láminas de color

 

 

 


 

 

 

PINCHA PARA SELECCIONAR IDIOMA / CLICK TO SELECT LANGUAGE

 

 






 

 

ENGLISH SECTION

 

 

Please read the following instructions and description carefully before joining the campaign. We know there is a lot of information, but it is essential to understand the campaign operation and will help you to save time making questions.
Thank you very much!

 

Quick menu:

  • CAMPAIGN DETAILS
  • MAP SECTIONS (this is important!)
  • IMAGE GALLERY
  • PERKS (here are the items offered...)
  • CONTENT
  • GOALS
  • SHIPPING
  • ABOUT US
  • CHANGE LANGUAGE



 

 

- RETURN TO MAIN MENU -
 

 

What is Iron Battlefield?

 

A new Sci-fi scenery range for 28mm wargames, designed to create heavy and industrial style structures over the battle board, through a highly configurable system for inner and outer game.

Appearance:

This range has been designed to make a realistic industrial environment: dark and metallic colours on main areas, like walls, floors, catwalks, grids... combining with high colourful and special items than provides sophistication to the group, like vivid colour plates, or crystal fences and tiles.

In sum, a metallic and heavy landscape, to recreate an industrial complex, big space hulks, and outer colonial facilities.

Features:

The offered sets have a great versatility, both in assembly and use. Designed under the MINEX standard, sectioned parts offer huge advantages:

Click images to enlarge

Click images to enlarge

  • Compatibility: all sections, as rooms, corridors, catwalks... are totally compatible. It is not only about the connection possibilities between them, but the different modules can be assembled to maximize the usable space within the same area.
  • Extensible: in the same way, they will be compatible with any new design, made by us or by another manufacturer as it is designed under the same standards.
  • Easy to paint and mount: Kits are made in medium grey pre-painted MDF lasercutted, and are served with a lot of autoadhesive plates of color and metal textures, and full color stickers. It allows a very easy assembly process, with a nice basic coloured result (just as a new car!!). If you want a more realistic finish, you can get it easily with washes and drybrush technics.
  • Realistic textures: As well as the basic MDF structure, the kits contains a lot of pieces made of several materials. Fiberglass metal finish grids, very thin and ultra clear crystals, and all kind of metallic appearance plates which will provide you the best results.
  • Versatility: almost all sections allow several assembly mods, also you can exchange parts with other sections after the main assembly. You will never get bored with this!!
  • Inside and outside options: With no doubt one of the most interesting feature. Sections can be used externally for a battleground wargame (Warhammer 40.000, Infinity), or internally (Space Hulk mainly), using the disassembled pieces too and enjoying the interior details.

 

Why from a campaign?

 

To raise money through a crowd funding campaign allow us to schedule for the medium and long term. It help us to get supplies and right machinery for an optimal production and reasonably priced items. Also, everyone knows than crowd funding is a powerful tool for a start-up project.

If you join our campaign, you will have additional advantages over common sales: items are offered at more affordable prices, and backers will be rewarded with additional pieces, which will be more by stretch goals!!

 

About deadline?

And... is this our first crowdfunding?

 

EnCobertura is a Spanish brand since 2007, and has been engaged in the scenery and wargame terrain manufacture. Our main offer has been the natural and geographic items, and also basic battlefields items (walls, ruins...). Now, from our experience on vector works and CNC technologies, we want offer the most ambitious futuristic scenery.

  • Amoured Defences: Our first funded campaign, although not too popular. Finished in September 2013, and all deliveries were completed in less than 4 months.

Now we hope that Iron Battlefield gets great results, but we know that it will be possible thanks to your support and help!!

- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL -
 

 

¿Qué es Iron Battlefield?

 

Es nuestra nueva línea de escenografía temática Sci-Fi para wargames en 28mm, que pretende recrear entornos de estructuras pesadas y construcciones de diseño industrial, utilizando un sistema de piezas altamente compatible y configurable para el juego interior y exterior.

Estética:

Esta línea ha sido diseñada para recrear un entorno puramente industrial: tonos oscuros y metálicos en las áreas principales, como paredes, suelos, pasarelas, rejillas... combinados con elementos que aportan color, diseño y sofisticación al conjunto, como paneles en colores vivos, signalética variada, y barandas y baldosas de cristal.

En resumen, un paisaje metálico y pesado, propio de complejos industriales, grandes pecios espaciales, e instalaciones coloniales de exterior.

Funcionalidad:

Las construcciones ofrecidas poseen un alto grado de versatilidad, tanto en montaje como en empleo. Diseñadas bajo nuestro estándar MINEX, las secciones ofrecen las siguientes ventajas:

Pincha las imágenes para agrandar

Pincha las imágenes para agrandar

  • Compatibilidad: todas las secciones son compatibles entre ellas, ya sean habitaciones, corredores, pasarelas... Esto no quiere decir solamente que puedan ser conectadas, sino que lo harán respetando unos tamaños y medidas que permitirán la “más comprimida de las configuraciones posible”. Es decir, las secciones se “molestarán” entre ellas lo menos posible a fin de permitir el máximo posicionamiento de piezas en una misma área.
  • Ampliable: Del mismo modo, serán compatibles con cualquier pieza diseñada en el futuro, por nosotros u otro fabricante gracias a estar diseñado bajo un mismo estándar de fabricación.
  • Fácil de montar y pintar: Los kits en DM pre-pintado y cortado a láser, y se siven con un montón de láminas autoadhesivas de color y de texturas metálicas, además de acompañarse de pegatinas a todo color. Esto permite un fácil proceso de montaje, con un acabado de color básico muy agradable (¡como un coche nuevo!). Si deseas un acabado más realista, puedes conseguirlo fácilmente a través de sencillas técnicas de aguadas y pincel seco.
  • Texturas realistas: Además de la estructura en DM, los kits contienen muchas piezas en diversos materiales: Rejillas de fibra de vidrio pero de aspecto metálico, cristales muy finos y ultra transparentes, y todo tipo de láminas de aspecto metálico te ayudarán a conseguir los mejores resultados.
  • Versatilidad: casi todas las secciones permiten varios modos de montajes básicos, además de la posibilidad de cambiar algunas de sus partes de posición en cualquier momento, o incluso intercambiarlas con partes de otras secciones después del montaje básico. ¡¡Nunca podrás aburrirte con ellas!!
  • Juego para interior y exterior: tal vez, la principal característica. Las secciones pueden ser utilizadas en juegos de campo abierto (como Warhammer 40.000, Infinity...), y desmontarse parcialmente para ser utilizadas en juegos de interior (como Space Hulk...), dando utilidad a las piezas desmontadas y disfrutando de su detallado interior.

 

¿Por qué desde una campaña?

 

Recaudar fondos a través de una campaña de mecenazgo nos facilita programar una producción a medio-largo plazo, lo cual nos permite la adquisición de materiales y maquinaria adecuada para una fabricación a un precio muy competitivo.

Además, y como bien es sabido, la oferta a través de un mecenazgo tiene un fuerte poder de convocatoria, ideal para lanzar un proyecto de nueva creación.

Participar en nuestra campaña tendrá ventajas adicionales sobre la futura venta directa: Los artículos son ofrecidos a un precio más competitivo, y los contribuyentes serán incentivados con material adicional a su contribución, ¡¡cuya cantidad irá en aumento según se consigan diferentes metas!!

 

¿Y la fecha de entrega?

 

Nos gustaría enviar en Diciembre de este año, ¡¡procurándoos así unas navidades entretenidas!! Pero no sabemos qué problemas pueden ocurrir, ya que debemos adquirir una cortadora láser nueva, aprender a utilizarla, y optimizar todos los diseños. Por tanto, queremos avisar que el proyecto puede retrasarse algunos meses, motivo por el cual, la fecha estimada mostrada en las contribuciones es de Enero de 2016.

Obviamente, mantendremos el contacto después del proyecto, actualizando todos los meses como mínimo.

Tened en cuenta que los primeros interesados en entregar somos nosotros, porque eso significa poder publicar más campañas antes, y mantener nuestra reputación.

Además del DM cortado a láser, todos los kits incluyen láminas autoadhesivas para el interior de todas las secciones, proveyendo los diferentes diseños mostrados en la misma cantidad. Igualmente ocurre con las baldosas: se proveerán más que suficientes para cada kit, y de diferentes tipos y diseños para distintas combinaciones. El acabado básico del exterior de las secciones es metálico. Ofrecemos cinco opciones de color (rojo, azul, verde, amarillo y naranja) que puedes adquirir a través de las contribuciones de "LÁMINAS DE COLOR"

. Y por supuesto, instrucciones suficiente para el montaje correcto.

Pincha las imágenes para agrandar.

 

Respecto a los detalles y las piezas "difíciles de contar", los kits contienen (Pincha las imágenes para agrandar):

- 3x pantallas de cristal de color (rojo, azul y verde) por cada corredor de 4 casillas (¡puedes ponerlas donde quieras!).


 

- 2x ventanas de cristal (diseño "Area 19" en rojo, ¡pero aparecerán más!) por cada habitación de 3x3 casillas con 2 accesos en L (puedes montarlos también en cualquier espacio de 3 casillas).


 

- Los diferentes modelos de esquinas de resina (5) serán suministrados en el mismo número, teniendo cada kit suficientes.


 

- Todas las secciones tendrán 1x puerta (cuando haya 2 ó 3 accesos) ó 2x puertas (cuando haya 4 accesos). Los diseños actuales (3) serán suministrados en el mismo número.


 

- 1x piezas de tuberías de "3 casillas de longitud" por cada "corredor de 3 casillas" y

1x piezas de tuberías de "2 casillas de longitud" por cada "corredor de 2 casillas".

 


 

- 1x kit de maquinaria por cada "habitación de 3x3 casillas y 4 accesos" (que podrás poner donde quieras...).


 

- Un montón de etiquetas muy chulas de peligro y otra signalética.


 

- Y por último, suficientes barandas para todas las construcciones y pasarelas (las construcciones tienen mamparos de cristal y las pasarelas de tipo "pasamanos").

 

 

- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL -
 

Todos los contribuyentes recibirán regalos adicionales por cada meta que nos ayuden a alcanzar. Existirán diferentes categorías de regalos, los cuales dependerán del tipo de contribución adquirida. Cada contribución indica qué categorías permite, y cada regalo indica a qué categoría pertenece y si tiene alguna condición especial. Pondremos al día de las metas y regalos adquiridos en la sección "Update" (arriba del todo).



- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL -
 

Los gastos de envío serán pagados antes de mandar el material, y después de contactar con vosotros e indicaros el total requerido. De este modo, tanto los contribuyentes como nosotros tendremos más control sobre el envío. Además, este sistena nos ayuda en cuestiones de impuestos y comisiones.



- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL -
 

 

Y... ¿es nuestra primera campaña?

 

EnCobertura es una marca española nacida en 2007 dedicada a la fabricación de escenografía y terrenos para wargames. Nuestra principal oferta siempre han sido los elementos naturales y los accidentes geografícos, además de elementos básicos para campos de batalla (muros, ruinas...). Ahora, gracias a nuestra experiencia con el trabajo vectorial y las tecnologías CNC, queremos dedicarnos también a la escenografía futurista más ambiciosa.

Esta no es nuestra primera campaña. Podemos presumir de tener dos campañas presentadas y entregadas en menos de un año, que además generaron una gran satisfacción en nuestros clientes:

  • Amoured Defences: Nuestra primera campaña de éxito, aunque de muy corto alcance. Realizada en Septiembre de 2013, fue entregada en menos de 4 meses.
  • Battlefield Operations II: Nuestra segunda campaña de éxito, siendo un gran éxito sobre dos intentos fallidos previos, con mayor alcance y recaudación. Realizada a principios de 2014 con una recaudación total de 10.110€, y entregada entre los 6 y 9 meses posteriores a su finalización.

Ahora esperamos que Iron Battlefield sea nuestra tercera campaña de éxito, aunque sabemos que será posible ¡gracias a vuestro apoyo y difusión!

What is Iron Battlefield?
 
A new Sci-fi scenery range for 28mm wargames, designed to create heavy and industrial style structures over the battle board, through a highly configurable system for inner and outer game.
Appearance:
This range has been designed to make a realistic industrial environment: dark and metallic colours on main areas, like walls, floors, catwalks, grids... combining with high colourful and special items than provides sophistication to the group, like vivid colour plates, or crystal fences and tiles.
In sum, a metallic and heavy landscape, to recreate an industrial complex, big space hulks, and outer colonial facilities.
Features:
The offered sets have a great versatility, both in assembly and use. Designed under the MINEX standard, sectioned parts offer huge advantages:

Click images to enlarge
Click images to enlarge



Compatibility: all sections, as rooms, corridors, catwalks... are totally compatible. It is not only about the connection possibilities between them, but the different modules can be assembled to maximize the usable space within the same area.

Extensible: in the same way, they will be compatible with any new design, made by us or by another manufacturer as it is designed under the same standards.

Easy to paint and mount: Kits are made in medium grey pre-painted MDF lasercutted, and are served with a lot of autoadhesive plates of color and metal textures, and full color stickers. It allows a very easy assembly process, with a nice basic coloured result (just as a new car!!). If you want a more realistic finish, you can get it easily with washes and drybrush technics.

Realistic textures: As well as the basic MDF structure, the kits contains a lot of pieces made of several materials. Fiberglass metal finish grids, very thin and ultra clear crystals, and all kind of metallic appearance plates which will provide you the best results.

Versatility: almost all sections allow several assembly mods, also you can exchange parts with other sections after the main assembly. You will never get bored with this!!

Inside and outside options: With no doubt one of the most interesting feature. Sections can be used externally for a battleground wargame (Warhammer 40.000, Infinity), or internally (Space Hulk mainly), using the disassembled pieces too and enjoying the interior details.

 
Why from a campaign?
 
To raise money through a crowd funding campaign allow us to schedule for the medium and long term. It help us to get supplies and right machinery for an optimal production and reasonably priced items. Also, everyone knows than crowd funding is a powerful tool for a start-up project.
If you join our campaign, you will have additional advantages over common sales: items are offered at more affordable prices, and backers will be rewarded with additional pieces, which will be more by stretch goals!!
 
About deadline?
 
We would like to send your goods in 2015 December, getting a funny Christmas for you! But we don´t what problems can happen, because we need acquire a new lasercutter, learn its operation, and optimize all designs. Then, we want notify you than project may be delayed some months, and for that reason, estimated date shown at perks is 2016 Jaunary.
Obviously, we will keep contact after the project, updating every months at least.
Please, note that the main concerned about delivery are us, because that means new campaigns and keep our good reputation

En resumen, un paisaje metálico y pesado, propio de complejos industriales, grandes pecios espaciales, e instalaciones coloniales de exterior.
Funcionalidad:
Las construcciones ofrecidas poseen un alto grado de versatilidad, tanto en montaje como en empleo. Diseñadas bajo nuestro estándar MINEX, las secciones ofrecen las siguientes ventajas:

Pincha las imágenes para agrandar
Pincha las imágenes para agrandar



Compatibilidad: todas las secciones son compatibles entre ellas, ya sean habitaciones, corredores, pasarelas... Esto no quiere decir solamente que puedan ser conectadas, sino que lo harán respetando unos tamaños y medidas que permitirán la “más comprimida de las configuraciones posible”. Es decir, las secciones se “molestarán” entre ellas lo menos posible a fin de permitir el máximo posicionamiento de piezas en una misma área.

Ampliable: Del mismo modo, serán compatibles con cualquier pieza diseñada en el futuro, por nosotros u otro fabricante gracias a estar diseñado bajo un mismo estándar de fabricación.

Fácil de montar y pintar: Los kits en DM pre-pintado y cortado a láser, y se siven con un montón de láminas autoadhesivas de color y de texturas metálicas, además de acompañarse de pegatinas a todo color. Esto permite un fácil proceso de montaje, con un acabado de color básico muy agradable (¡como un coche nuevo!). Si deseas un acabado más realista, puedes conseguirlo fácilmente a través de sencillas técnicas de aguadas y pincel seco.

Texturas realistas: Además de la estructura en DM, los kits contienen muchas piezas en diversos materiales: Rejillas de fibra de vidrio pero de aspecto metálico, cristales muy finos y ultra transparentes, y todo tipo de láminas de aspecto metálico te ayudarán a conseguir los mejores resultados.

Versatilidad: casi todas las secciones permiten varios modos de montajes básicos, además de la posibilidad de cambiar algunas de sus partes de posición en cualquier momento, o incluso intercambiarlas con partes de otras secciones después del montaje básico. ¡¡Nunca podrás aburrirte con ellas!!

Juego para interior y exterior: tal vez, la principal característica. Las secciones pueden ser utilizadas en juegos de campo abierto (como Warhammer 40.000, Infinity...), y desmontarse parcialmente para ser utilizadas en juegos de interior (como Space Hulk...), dando utilidad a las piezas desmontadas y disfrutando de su detallado interior.

 
¿Por qué desde una campaña?
 
Recaudar fondos a través de una campaña de mecenazgo nos facilita programar una producción a medio-largo plazo, lo cual nos permite la adquisición de materiales y maquinaria adecuada para una fabricación a un precio muy competitivo.
Además, y como bien es sabido, la oferta a través de un mecenazgo tiene un fuerte poder de convocatoria, ideal para lanzar un proyecto de nueva creación.
Participar en nuestra campaña tendrá ventajas adicionales sobre la futura venta directa: Los artículos son ofrecidos a un precio más competitivo, y los contribuyentes serán incentivados con material adicional a su contribución, ¡¡cuya cantidad irá en aumento según se consigan diferentes metas!!
 
¿Y la fecha de entrega?
 
Nos gustaría enviar en Diciembre de este año, ¡¡procurándoos así unas navidades entretenidas!! Pero no sabemos qué problemas pueden ocurrir, ya que debemos adquirir una cortadora láser nueva, aprender a utilizarla, y optimizar todos los diseños. Por tanto, queremos avisar que el proyecto puede retrasarse algunos meses, motivo por el cual, la fecha estimada mostrada en las contribuciones es de Enero de 2016.
Obviamente, mantendremos el contacto después del proyecto, actualizando todos los meses como mínimo.
Tened en cuenta que los primeros interesados en entregar somos nosotros, porque eso significa poder publicar más campañas antes, y mantener nuestra reputación.

- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL - Las recompensas son ofrecidas en kits de varias secciones. Cada una muestra un esquema con tales secciones en una distribución aleatoria. Estas son las secciones que encontrarás en cada descripción:

Pincha las imágenes para agrandar
       


- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL - Visita las galerías de fotos en nuestra página de Facebook (no necesitas estar registrado en Facebook, son de acceso público):

   

 

 
- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL - Puedes contribuir a nuestra campaña a través de una amplia gama de modelos, los cuales te permiten el montaje de conjuntos más o menos grandes:
Importante: Por favor, si estás interesado en varios modelos, solicítalos realizando las contribuciones una por una, aunque sean acerca del mismo kit. Sabemos que esto puede ser algo tedioso, pero es fundamental para ayudarnos a procesar el pedido correctamente a través de nuestro sistema de contabilidad. ¡¡Gracias por entenderlo!!
Nota: Las secciones y accesorios que verás son las primeros modelos de este proyecto. Los modelos definitivos pueden variar levemente por motivos de optimización, pero siempre mantendrán el concepto original.
Pincha las imágenes para agrandar


  
CONTRIBUCIÓN 1: GARITA / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
   
CONTRIBUCIÓN 2: PLATAFORMA / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
   
CONTRIBUCIÓN 3: PUESTO AVANZADO / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
   
CONTRIBUCIÓN 4: BASE / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
   
CONTRIBUCIÓN 5: INSTALACIÓN / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
   
CONTRIBUCIÓN 6: COMPLEJO / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
   
CONTRIBUCIÓN 7: COLONIA / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
   
CONTRIBUCIÓN 8: CIUDAD COLMENA / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
  EXPANSIONES  
EXPANSIÓN 1: PASARELAS / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
  
EXPANSIÓN 2: PLATAFORMAS / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
  
EXPANSIÓN 3: CORREDORES / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
  
EXPANSIÓN 4: SECCIONES ESPECIALES / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 
  
EXPANSIÓN 8: HABITACIONES / ADQUIRIR ESTE.
 



- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL - Además del DM cortado a láser, todos los kits incluyen láminas autoadhesivas para el interior de todas las secciones, proveyendo los diferentes diseños mostrados en la misma cantidad. Igualmente ocurre con las baldosas: se proveerán más que suficientes para cada kit, y de diferentes tipos y diseños para distintas combinaciones. El acabado básico del exterior de las secciones es metálico. Ofrecemos cinco opciones de color (rojo, azul, verde, amarillo y naranja) que puedes adquirir a través de las contribuciones de "LÁMINAS DE COLOR". Y por supuesto, instrucciones suficiente para el montaje correcto.  Pincha las imágenes para agrandar. Respecto a los detalles y las piezas "difíciles de contar", los kits contienen (Pincha las imágenes para agrandar):
- 3x pantallas de cristal de color (rojo, azul y verde) por cada corredor de 4 casillas (¡puedes ponerlas donde quieras!).  - 2x ventanas de cristal (diseño "Area 19" en rojo, ¡pero aparecerán más!) por cada habitación de 3x3 casillas con 2 accesos en L (puedes montarlos también en cualquier espacio de 3 casillas).  - Los diferentes modelos de esquinas de resina (5) serán suministrados en el mismo número, teniendo cada kit suficientes.  - Todas las secciones tendrán 1x puerta (cuando haya 2 ó 3 accesos) ó 2x puertas (cuando haya 4 accesos). Los diseños actuales (3) serán suministrados en el mismo número.  - 1x piezas de tuberías de "3 casillas de longitud" por cada "corredor de 3 casillas" y 1x piezas de tuberías de "2 casillas de longitud" por cada "corredor de 2 casillas".   - 1x kit de maquinaria por cada "habitación de 3x3 casillas y 4 accesos" (que podrás poner donde quieras...).  - Un montón de etiquetas muy chulas de peligro y otra signalética.  - Y por último, suficientes barandas para todas las construcciones y pasarelas (las construcciones tienen mamparos de cristal y las pasarelas de tipo "pasamanos"). 
 

 
- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL - Todos los contribuyentes recibirán regalos adicionales por cada meta que nos ayuden a alcanzar. Existirán diferentes categorías de regalos, los cuales dependerán del tipo de contribución adquirida. Cada contribución indica qué categorías permite, y cada regalo indica a qué categoría pertenece y si tiene alguna condición especial. Pondremos al día de las metas y regalos adquiridos en la sección "Update" (arriba del todo).


- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL - Los gastos de envío serán pagados antes de mandar el material, y después de contactar con vosotros e indicaros el total requerido. De este modo, tanto los contribuyentes como nosotros tendremos más control sobre el envío. Además, este sistena nos ayuda en cuestiones de impuestos y comisiones.


- VOLVER AL MENÚ PRINCIPAL -  
Y... ¿es nuestra primera campaña?
 
EnCobertura es una marca española nacida en 2007 dedicada a la fabricación de escenografía y terrenos para wargames. Nuestra principal oferta siempre han sido los elementos naturales y los accidentes geografícos, además de elementos básicos para campos de batalla (muros, ruinas...). Ahora, gracias a nuestra experiencia con el trabajo vectorial y las tecnologías CNC, queremos dedicarnos también a la escenografía futurista más ambiciosa.
Esta no es nuestra primera campaña. Podemos presumir de tener dos campañas presentadas y entregadas en menos de un año, que además generaron una gran satisfacción en nuestros clientes:


Amoured Defences: Nuestra primera campaña de éxito, aunque de muy corto alcance. Realizada en Septiembre de 2013, fue entregada en menos de 4 meses.

Battlefield Operations II: Nuestra segunda campaña de éxito, siendo un gran éxito sobre dos intentos fallidos previos, con mayor alcance y recaudación. Realizada a principios de 2014 con una recaudación total de 10.110€, y entregada entre los 6 y 9 meses posteriores a su finalización.

Ahora esperamos que Iron Battlefield sea nuestra tercera campaña de éxito, aunque sabemos que será posible ¡gracias a vuestro apoyo y difusión!

story:
Space Princess is an elegant strategy game for two.  Play as the Space Princess and use wits, holograms, and your trusty blaster to evade the forces of evil and escape the star cruiser. Or play as the Dark Zealot, controlling troopers and sinister powers to trap the Space Princess before she escapes. 

 

"This is a really great two-player game! It's tense and well-balanced! It's been awesome watching the game evolve and seeing the passion put into this project."

- Jonathan Gilmour, designer of Dead of Winter

 

The game was inspired by our favorite space princess, Carrie Fisher. We are releasing it to honor her memory and inspire new heroes to follow in her footsteps.  You can be a hero by helping us make Space Princess a reality. Each pledge to our campaign contributes to a donation to the International Bipolar Foundation, a world organization that promotes education and awareness of bipolar disorder and offers support to families affected by it.  The cause was supported by Ms. Fisher, and is especially relevant to members of our team whose family members have struggled with bipolar disorder.

UPDATE:  We have exceeded our charity goal of $1000!  THANK YOU!!!!

Our goal is to raise at least $1000 for the International Bipolar Foundation. For each pledge, Nerdy Pup Games will donate its share from the cost of the game to the cause.

Help us support an important cause, and experience a terrific game as a reward!

 

 

 

"A clever and quick strategy game with meaningful decisions that allow me to play the player as well as the game." 

- Jon Mietling, designer of Palm Island 

 

Space Princess is a fast but challenging strategy game for two players.  Each player has a unique set of action cards that makes both sides fun and interesting to play. The goal of the Space Princess is to reach one of two escape pods on the board in order to escape the star cruiser. The Dark Zealot's goal is to capture the Space Princess before she can escape. 

Cards are laid out to create the floorplan of the Dark Zealot's starcruiser.

On a turn:
Both players draw 2 action cards from their deck, and choose 1 action to play simultaneously. The remaining card goes to the bottom of their deck.

Players reveal their chosen cards, and resolve them in order value, lowest to highest.

The Space Princess action cards allow her to move and rotate doors to make her way to an escape pod. She can fire her trusty blaster at troopers.  In a pinch, she can place a Hologram as a decoy or Hide, disappearing from the board for a turn.

The Dark Zealot action cards allow him to move himself and his troopers to outflank the Princess.  Troopers can fire at the Princess if they have a clear shot, and the Zealot can capture the Princess if he moves into her space. The Zealot can use his dark powers to Sense, playing a discarded card after the Princess reveals her action, or seal a door shut using the Lock.

The game ends when either the Princess reaches an escape pod or the Zealot captures her.

Space Princess is a game of cat-and-mouse, and typically takes 15 to 20 mins to play. Small, portable, and easy to set up, you can take Space Princess with you anywhere you go and have minutes or hours of challenging play to suit your needs.

You can read the complete rules and try out a basic print-and-play version here:

Space Princess Playtest Rules & Cards

 

 Read the Review | Watch Video Playthrough

"This game hits the aspects of a good two player game I love. Quick set up and play and solid back and forth mechanics where one person can’t just run away with the victory."

- Isaac Villa, Gaming with Sidekicks

 

 Watch the Review

"It has some cool little twists that keep you interested... I definitely recommend it."

- Kas Ismail, Dice Odyssey

 

More Coming Soon!

 

International Bipolar Foundation (IBPF) was founded in June 2007 in San Diego, California by four parents with children affected by bipolar disorder. Well aware of the trauma that bipolar disorder causes for consumers and their families, these parents felt compelled to do something constructive to help.

About 5.7 million American adults, or about 2.6 percent of the population, age 18 and older in any given year, have bipolar disorder. Bipolar disorder typically develops in late adolescence or early adulthood. However, some people have their first symptoms during childhood, and some develop them late in life. It is often not recognized as an illness, and people may suffer for years before it is properly diagnosed and treated. Like diabetes or heart disease, bipolar disorder is a long-term illness that must be carefully managed throughout a person’s life (National Institute of Mental Health).

You can learn more about IBPF and bipolar disorder by visiting their website at ibpf.org.

 

Michael Addison - Designer

Michael is a game designer from Northwest Ohio.  Space Princess is his first published game.

Rachel Kozy - Illustrator

Rachel is a freelance illustrator and visual designer. You can see more of her work here.

Ian Moss - Graphic Design

Ian is a graphic designer and game designer.  He is currently working on several top-secret projects, and has a very professional email address.

 

Space Princess is the first game released by Nerdy Pup Games.  Typically, a first game could mean a lot of lessons learned on our part as we navigate manufacturing and shipping and other new challenges. However, we hope to avoid many potential first-time issues by using the print-on-demand service, The Game Crafter, for manufacturing and handling of our bulk orders.  All images of the game on the campaign site are copies of the game printed by The Game Crafter, and our experience with shipping from them has been timely and dependable.

The game itself is rules-complete, and has undergone a year of playtesting at Unpub and with local design groups. Art and graphic design are also complete.  If our campaign is successful, we are ready to place an order with the manufacturer and have the game shipped directly to you.

Our campaign is set to end on April 5th.  If we are successful, we expect funds to release from Indiegogo within three weeks.  At the end of April, we plan to post live on Twitter and Facebook as we make the donation to IBPF so that all of our supporters can share in the warm fuzzies!

 

You can help support our campaign by sharing on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram to help spread the word about the game and the cause.  You can also use Indiegogo's share tools to help others find the campaign.

Thanks again for your support! 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Why Indiegogo, and not Kickstarter?

Indiegogo offers a great platform for funding and has no restrictions on charitable campaigns. Kickstarter is regarded as a destination platform for board games, but its site rules prohibit campaigns with a charitable component. We are proud to join the Indiegogo community and offer backers a chance to not only support a great game, but also a great cause.

 

Can I give more than the Perk level ($5, $25, or $45) to the campaign?

Yes.  Any funds collected beyond the selected Perk level contribute directly to the donation made by Nerdy Pup Games to the International Bipolar Foundation.  Indiegogo collects a 5% fee on all funds given through the platform, so keep in mind that the 5% platform fee will be applied to the entire amount you give.

Please note shipping is NOT included in the pledge prices and will be charged separately in the pledge manager,

 

Alien Puppies is a 2-5 player strategic card game adventure with Sci-Fi Puppies.

Be the first person to collect Alien Puppies and avoid Barkmageddon to become the Ultimate Champion of the Puppy Universe!  

 

There are 50+ Dog Breeds/Pups in Cyberpunk Deck:

Frenchie, Pug, Husky, Shiba, Poodle, Dalmatian, Hokkaido, Akita, Corgi, Chihuahua, Pitbull, Shih Tzu, Leonberger, Boxer, Great Dane, Hound, Mountain, Portie, Shikoku, Dobermann, Skypoo, Border Collie, Rottweiler, Hrti, Wolfdog, Greyhound, Elkhound, Puli, Spaniel, Komondor, Shepherd, Jack Russell, Labrador Retriever, Pomeranian, Shar Pei, Heeler, Dachshund, Beagle, Sheltie, Kugsha, Cane, Pinscher, Chow Chow, Mastiff, Cocker, Papillon, Schnauzer, Newfoundland, Malamute, Whippet, Bandog, Terrier, Staffy, Otterhound.

 

PREVIEWS AND REVIEWS

 
 

Click here for review by Geekdad.com: 

 

 

 

 

Check our Kickstarter Page for more information: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/alienpuppi...

Join our Facebook Community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/alienpuppies

story:
The Keyando Cards - developed according to the latest International Research on Human Flourishing and Happiness

The 46 different Keyando cards represent adventure, love, freedom, nature, security and everything in between. All that we think, feel, or do is related to one of more of these keys. Together they open a playful space for mindful reflection. The keys in Keyando are based on scientific research and do not correspond to any particular belief system.  

Your story counts!

These beautiful cards are designed to promote mindfulness, connection, and purpose wherever we go. The cards can be used for a inspiring games, daily inspiration, exploring life questions, or simply as a resource and reminder to be more present. Interacting with the cards puts us in touch with our thoughts, feelings, desires and needs. By listening to the key cards that speak to us, we get closer to ourselves while exploring our relationship to the world and others. 

The Keyando cards can be used in a variety of different spreads and routines for encouraging mindfulness and getting orientation in our pursuit of happiness.  

And the Keyando cards can be used to play a range of fun and inspiring games.  

 

Keyando - The Game of Happiness

The Game of Happiness is a dynamic group card game that’s sure to cause laughter, thoughtfulness, and lively conversation. In this new game your story counts. It can be used to break the ice with new friends or to get closer to people we already know. If you like the games Activity, Dixit, or Truth or Dare you will LOVE The Game of Happiness. 

Players can participate in The Game of Happiness in various ways, by telling stories, challenging others in the form of questions, or simply by playing strategically. Each round is filled with vivid discussions about your stories, beliefs and what matters to you. The game is perfect for get-togethers with family, friends, or workmates who want to get to know each other in a fun, new way. It’s great for parties and team building.

The Game of Happiness is designed for 3 to 6 players (Ages 12+). Learning the game takes 10 minutes, and playing it takes anywhere between 30 and 90 minutes.


One objective of the game is to arrange a Landscape of Happiness

 

WHAT ELSE CAN WE DO WITH KEY CARDS?

1. Play other games as well like Concentration, Hanafuda or Kemps (Ages 6+).

2. Use the cards for modern Tarot readings.

3. Integrate the cards into mindfulness and happiness pratice with different spreads. 

For more examples of possibiles spreads and routines please see further down. 

 

Learning - The most underestimated Key to Happiness

 

Responsibility - A card in the set with a disruptive image

 

INTERVIEW WITH DIRK DE POL ABOUT KEYANDO  

Thanks to Alexia Anastasio! Check out her projects on www.alexiaanastasio.com.

 

WHAT DO TESTERS AND GAMERS THINK ABOUT KEYANDO?

António and Dirk would like to thank all beta-testers, friends, gamers, life coaches, trainers and supporters who helped us fine-tune the Keyando cards, rules and routines. Some of them even came up with ideas for new rules and spreads. Here are some of their statements.

"What a great game! The world needs more traditions where people can reflect on their own lives and bond with others." Adam Baltieri, Berlin.

"Playing with the Keyando beta cards now! This game is a great idea! Great energy! Thanks Dirk!" Kirk G., Arizona.

"Dirk, I like the concept. Keyando deserves to be heard by many people." Rukesh Patel, Pune India. 

"I played the game two times. I was amazed how quickly I could get to know people who where totally strangers to me before the first time I played it. Second time I was with a group of friends when Dirk came to introduce us the game. While playing the conversation shifted to another level of intimacy. Everybody in the group was included to the conversation and game. I loved to see their smiling faces and to get to know them better then before." Reinhard Clemens, Berlin. 

"I think it's a very versatile game/tool to get to know one another. I realized too, everyone wants to be disconnected and be entertained but not really participate. This is what the generation needs. Let's get this thing moving and shared on social media! And the art is really nice too." Brandon Roots, Citrus Heights, CA.

"I love it! Everyone at the table really opens up. Even our teenage kids..." Lore T., Long Island.

Thanks to Spielwiese Berlin

"I'm not a fan of classic tabletop games, but Keyando should be in your cabinet. It is a game in which, through skillful questions, we can squeeze out funny, embarrassing or sometimes even intimate truths from our friends ... all participants try to surpass themselves and more and more new aspects come to daylight. I was thrilled and we played several rounds. The depth during the game was enormous!" Dominik Birke, Nürnberg.

"If we throw these cards into the circle of playful friends or strangers, in only a few minutes we will learn about things from which we have had no idea, and we will know exactly who we want to see more often or never again ... I have not experienced so much wild discussion, laughter, and shouting in the last few years, as in this game ..." Yvonne Bloesch, Berlin.

"Such beautiful artwork and a game for sharing thoughts and strategies for mindfulness and happiness - perfect game!" Ercan Tekce, Berlin. 

"Thrilling! All the fun comes from the contributions and stories of the co-players. So, like in real life: with the selection of interesting players the pleasure doubles. From hearty laughter to tears there are all emotions. Through the frame the game sets, the conversations remained playful despite the depth and the whole group took part. Thus, both extroverted and introverted people were encouraged to participate in the game..." Jens Berggreen, Hamburg.

"Today I finally had the opportunity to play Keyando. All the players (trainers and coaches) were very impressed. It is a great tool to get into deeper exchange and offers a lot of creative possibilities to invent own questions and approaches. We find the cards very stimulating and imaginative. We had fun and recommend it and continue to play!" Katherina H., Berlin. 

  

THE KEYANDO CARDS  

Here you can see our high-quality large format cards (7x12 cm / 2,76x4,7 inch) in comparison with standard poker cards and other playing cards.  

Comparison of Card Sizes and Boxes / Lumex Print

We’ve created all cards in high-resolution, even suitable for poster or canvas prints. 

  

THE RULES OF THE GAME OF HAPPINESS

At the beginning of the game, all players get 5 cards. Whoever plays all his cards first, wins. Going clockwise, the player next to the dealer starts the game. When it’s your turn you have one of the following options:

 

ASK

Lay down a card in front of a co-player and ask him anything you like about it.

ASK

For example, when you play the “Challenges” card, you could ask: “What means this card to you?”, or more specific: “What was your biggest challenge?” Your imagination is your only limit here. Especially when you play an angel or vampire card which can represent whatever you like, and allows you to ask whatever you want.

If you are satisfied with the answer, your card stays on the table and the player asked plays next as a reward. If the answer is refused the player asked has to draw a card from the pile and you must withdraw your card and it will be the next player’s turn.

 

LAY

Instead of asking or telling something you can simply lay down a card that fits to one which is already on the table. One objective is to arrange the cards played in 4 rows of 12 cards each. The cards form a puzzle with a landscape on it.

LAY

It is possible to lay down several matching cards at once. If “Winning” is one of your keys to happiness this might be a good way to go.

THAT’S IT! MORE OR LESS … THERE ARE SOME MORE THINGS TO CONSIDER.

 

STOP A TURN

When it’s getting out of hand or when someone is just about to win you can use a joker (angel or vampire) at any time, and then the next person clockwise will be on!

Important: If you interrupt a turn all cards played in that turn have to be taken back. Most likely some co-players will not be happy about that…

 

STRATEGY

Part of the fun is to develop your own strategy in this highly dynamic game. No game will be the same, so it will keep you on your toes.

Angel and vampire cards are the most powerful cards in the game. They can stop any game situation, and the can represent whatever you like, when you are asking or telling something.

 

END OF THE GAME

Whoever plays all his cards first, wins! However, if you forget to shout „Keyando!“ at the end, you have to take back your last card (or cards) and you get an additional card from the pile!

Yikes!

SOUNDS LIKE FUN? THEN SUPPORT US!

 

THE PERKS

 

 

WHAT ARE YOU FUNDING?

  • Costs of the card stock and the booklet
  • Printing of the cards, booklet, and boxes
  • Helping yourself and others to be more happy and mindul
  • Highly versatile cards which can be used for The Game of Happiness and other games like Concentration, Hanafuda or Kemps.

 

As a Keyando Angel Superbacker you'll be supporting public schools with a game:

  • creates new communities and friendships,
  • supports empathy and the development of personality,
  • increases communicative and social competences,
  • and fosters a peaceful conflict resolution.

 

INSTANT REWARD, FULFILLMENT AND SHIPPING 

INSTANT REWARD: If you choose a reward which includes a PDF copy you will immediately receive the printable cards and the rules of The Game of Happiness which you can print out at home. Spread the word!

FULFILLMENT MADE IN GERMANY: We will fulfill all rewards from Germany. We are teaming up with one of the most renowned European playing card printers based in Germany to ensure we can deliver high quality cards both on time, and on spec.

WE ARE EU-FRIENDLY: Backers from the EU do not have to worry about customs or VAT.

SHIPPING COSTS WORLDWIDE ARE INCLUDED. 

 

What You See Is What You Get - we run a simple, straightforward campaign. We’ve already thrown everything into this game - a lot of time, effort, and money, and we intend to deliver a high-quality product printed on only the best materials.

 

MINDFULNESS AND HAPPINESS WITH KEYANDO

Key Card Mindfulness

Current studies clearly show - there is no universal formula for happiness. The keys to your happiness are unique. The reason for this is simple. We all grow up in different families and environments, within diverse societies, cultures and historical backgrounds. Our unique experiences make us who we are; the situations and dramas we live through are never the same. We have different genes and character traits that contribute to the complex whole of our personality— and at every given moment we find ourselves in different phases of our personal development.

No matter how we use the Keyando cards, they will take on the flavor of our own creativity, thoughts, and wishes. Using the Keyando cards as a game or guide to self-discovery puts us in touch with the keys to our happiness, opening the way to integrating them into our lives so that we can find balance, achieve our goals, and create more satisfaction for ourselves and others.

 

How can the Keyando Cards be used for more Mindfulness, Happiness and Tarot?

Here just a few examples of what we can do with the Keyando cards:

 

The Wheel of Life

The Wheel of Life is a common tool for creating more balance in your life and rethinking and setting your goals. Using the Wheel of Life as a starting point, allows you to reflect how satisfied you are in the different areas of your life.

What you see above is an example setup of a nearly balanced Wheel of Life with the areas growth, love, friendship, family, security, health, working, and faith.

The Wheel is based on a scoring system from 1 to 10. Simply reflect and rate your satisfaction levels for each area out of 10, where 1 is closest to the center.

How you can work with the Keyando cards and the Wheel of Life in order to improve an important area of your life or to define your goals more clearly is described in the Keyando-Booklet in detail.

 

My Keys

My Keys is about answering the question: “What are my keys to happiness?”

Shuffle the cards and place one after the other face up on the table. Place the cards to the top which appear important for you. Place a card at the bottom of table if you think is not that important to you.

Make up your mind about each card within 3 seconds, decide spontaneously.

When you’re done, take your time to look on the cards on the top and select just 7 cards of which you think that these are your essential happiness keys.

Congrats, you just detected your individual set of keys to happiness!

If you like you can relate them to your goals or areas of life which you like to improve.

 

Inspirations

Shuffle the cards and then lay down the first 12 cards face up on the table. Select 3 of the 12 cards of which you think that they are important in your current situation or for the near future. Place these cards in a row.

Shuffle the remaining cards and place one after another below one of the 3 cards in the row. Place cards that do not fit to just to the side.

After you assigned all cards, try to find a hierarchy for the cards in each column. Inspirations allows you identify potential challenges and manage them.

 

THE TEAM

António Piedade: António (featured on the faith card) is a professional artist, and is responsible for illustrating the Keyando cards. Since he was young, he showed great interest in art, especially drawing and painting. In 2004 he studied visual arts and multimedia at university. He is inspired by artists like Egon Schiele, Toulouse Lautrec and Edward Hooper. In 2009 a passion for illustration grew in him, alongside the challenges and the freedom that come with it. Since then he’s been working as a freelancer for different companies and individuals for projects such as book covers, illustrations, infographics, and graphic design.

Dirk de Pol: Living in Berlin, Dirk (featured on the calmness card) has a background as art director, designer, life coach, business consultant, and entrepreneur. After studying humanities, Dirk worked for different educational institutions, for example as Editor in Chief of akademie.de and as CMO of TELES European Internet Academy AG. He is CEO of Pandavia GmbH in Berlin which publishes Keyando. He came up with the idea and works with António Piedade to make it a reality.

 

WE NEED YOUR HELP!

After we published a first print run of the cards, we fine-tuned the cards and the rules of the game based on feedback we received from players during countless trial sessions.

We need your support to pay for game development, intensive graphic design, and overall production costs. With your help, we’ll print the second edition of our  cards together with a comprehensive booklet including instructions and everything you need to know to get the most out of Keyando.

So, if you’re into games, mindfulness, happiness, and would like to get a copy of the Keyando cards, please support our project!

With love and good vibes!

António and Dirk 

 

Risks and challenges

We are teaming up with ASS Altenburger - one of the most renowned European playing card printers based in Germany - (we have worked with before) to ensure we can deliver high-quality cards on time, and on spec. We are confident in our ability to deliver Keyando quickly and on time. Nevertheless, unforeseen events may affect how quickly orders are fulfilled. Our goal is to ship the Keyando cards on time, by the dates listed on the pledge levels. The delivery times will vary according to your local postal services – once we ship, the shipment is the responsibility of the shipping company.  

Warning: Do not attempt to solve life problems with the Keyando cards. We do not take responsibility for any breakups, thrown objects, or apologies caused by the real emotions that may surface when playing or using the Keyando cards. If you use Keyando in life coaching or therapeutic contexts, you should be a trained specialist. By backing this project, you indicate that you have read, understood and agreed with the above.
story_txt:
The Keyando Cards - developed according to the latest International Research on Human Flourishing and HappinessThe 46 different Keyando cards represent adventure, love, freedom, nature, security and everything in between. All that we think, feel, or do is related to one of more of these keys. Together they open a playful space for mindful reflection. The keys in Keyando are based on scientific research and do not correspond to any particular belief system.  Your story counts!These beautiful cards are designed to promote mindfulness, connection, and purpose wherever we go. The cards can be used for a inspiring games, daily inspiration, exploring life questions, or simply as a resource and reminder to be more present. Interacting with the cards puts us in touch with our thoughts, feelings, desires and needs. By listening to the key cards that speak to us, we get closer to ourselves while exploring our relationship to the world and others. The Keyando cards can be used in a variety of different spreads and routines for encouraging mindfulness and getting orientation in our pursuit of happiness.  And the Keyando cards can be used to play a range of fun and inspiring games.   Keyando - The Game of HappinessThe Game of Happiness is a dynamic group card game that’s sure to cause laughter, thoughtfulness, and lively conversation. In this new game your story counts. It can be used to break the ice with new friends or to get closer to people we already know. If you like the games Activity, Dixit, or Truth or Dare you will LOVE The Game of Happiness. Players can participate in The Game of Happiness in various ways, by telling stories, challenging others in the form of questions, or simply by playing strategically. Each round is filled with vivid discussions about your stories, beliefs and what matters to you. The game is perfect for get-togethers with family, friends, or workmates who want to get to know each other in a fun, new way. It’s great for parties and team building.The Game of Happiness is designed for 3 to 6 players (Ages 12+). Learning the game takes 10 minutes, and playing it takes anywhere between 30 and 90 minutes.One objective of the game is to arrange a Landscape of Happiness WHAT ELSE CAN WE DO WITH KEY CARDS?1. Play other games as well like Concentration, Hanafuda or Kemps (Ages 6+).2. Use the cards for modern Tarot readings.3. Integrate the cards into mindfulness and happiness pratice with different spreads. For more examples of possibiles spreads and routines please see further down.  Learning - The most underestimated Key to Happiness Responsibility - A card in the set with a disruptive image

story:
Hello new backers!

Tilescape 2.0 is a modular building system which allows for the ultimate customization of terrain. With our system you will have total control over your structures. There are several unique possibilities for your floors, streets, buildings (inner and outer walls), accessories, and roofs.

~ Intuitive/fast building single piece tile system  
~ Modular vertical walls insert-able walls/posts/columns
~ Insert-able doors and windows
~ Insert-able accessories and decorations (curtains, traps, etc)

Gothic City is the newest completely customizable terrain project from Rocket Pig Games. We provide you with the .stl files and you bring them to life on your 3D printer. It utilizes our Tilescape 2.0 building system which features totally modular building components from the ground up! 

~ Universal and Versatile Set will work well with many types of gaming!
   (Call of Cthulhu, Iron Kingdoms/WarmaHordes, Malifaux, DnD, Steampunk, Victorian/Gothic settings, etc)
~ The Biggest Lovecraftian/Gothic horror monster miniatures ever made!
~ The most complex roof system available anywhere!
~ Make unique buildings in any shape and size!
~ Only modular system that has authentic medieval overhanging building
   floors.
~ The Gothic City Streets Core set also makes an a very good Dungeon tile-set.
~ Gothic City supplies everything you need to create a full medieval or
   Industrial Fantasy city!

~ Our unique and varied wooden floor planks, whimsical stone alleys, and brick streets can be used in their traditional way or as building interior floors, pathways, or balcony flooring.

Gothic City Buildings & Streets

Limitless options for building shapes, types, and sizes!

Make amazing streets and ally-ways with unique tiles!

Create villages, cities, or forest cabins with our generous selection of stone and wood walls and roads!

~ Our modular interior walls are insertable and can be arranged however you see fit and the exterior walls can soar to great heights or expand in any direction. Add dimension to your landscape by making your buildings as tall or as short as you want! 

Insert-able walls can be configured any way you want!

~ Our legendary roofing system allows you to expand your rooftops to create practically any shape roof you can imagine and comes complete with gables, eaves, and dormers!

Roof System can be configured in almost any configuration!

Some examples of areas to create within Gothic City include:

- The warm and welcoming residential district with timber-framed homes, beautiful brick walkways, meandering alleyways, and quaint street lamps. 

Gothic City Residential Neighborhood

- Serene network of bridges to weave throughout your city.

Create bridges of any length or shape!

- Use your Gothic Streets and Buildings to surround the Mythical Castle! 

Gothic City Castle parts and Gothic City Buildings parts can be combined to create amazing structures!

Create your inner castle anyway you choose with insertable walls and props!

Amazing Castle with so many building options!

Look at this drawbridge!

Enemies still cannot pass!

- The charming merchant district with a towering cathedral, stately brick storefronts, display windows, and awnings.

(See Add-Ons for Images)

- The buzzing industrial sector with grand factories and smokestacks.

(See Add-Ons for Images)

- And so much more!

Gothic City is comprised of THREE CORE SETS. All three sets will be available to download upon release so you can begin printing right away!

  • Street Rampways+Sidewalk variant
  • Street Stairs x4 variants
  • Brick Walls w/ double+triple wall variants (including windows+doors) 20+ pieces
  • Street Floors w/ Posts x5 variants
  • Brick Roads+Sidewalks (including grates+design variants) 10+ pieces

  • Wood Plank Floor
  • Wood Floors w/ Posts x5 variants
  • Building Columns for Exteriors+Interiors

Epic Dragons Bundle HERE

Dungeons Monsters Bundle HERE

    StoutHearted Heroes DO require supports and print beautifully on FDM & SLA printers!

    You can get these HERE

    Get it now!

      

    \

    Want to Fill Gothic City with Amazing Creatures and NPC's?

    If you just can't get enough and would like to add new and exciting content to your games then check out our Patreon! Our Monster Miniatures Patreon is the perfect way to get original, support-free content every month! We have a really fun and knowledgeable community through our Facebook and Patreon where customers print and show off our support-free models! These were designed for FDM printers and print 100% without supports. As resin printers have gained momentum, lots of our customers have been printing our models with them with great success support-free, as well!

    Each month we have a beautiful assortment of models for you that range from standard to deluxe to EPIC! You can choose which tier suits you and move amongst them each month as you see fit! As long as you remain a patron (at any of the levels) you qualify for our Loyalty Rewards program! We never sell those rewards in our store so the only way to get them is to remain with us. We also, offer various PDF's for our creations (those are also, not sold, and only obtainable through the patreon)

    As a Patron, you get access to a discount coupon for our store (www.rocketpiggames.com) for 50% off all month long! This is a great way to catch up on previous patreon and Kickstarter releases you may have missed!

    Our Patreon allows you (the patron) to participate in request threads and polls to choose what we create and release! Everyone has an equal chance to be heard and get their wishes to be brought to life!

    We use our proceeds from the store and Patreon to support farm animal rescues so by supporting us, you're saving lives! How great is that?

    Hobby to Business!

    For those of you with that entrepreneurial spirit, we offer several printing license tiers through our Patreon. Choose the one that best suits your needs and sell your prints to pay for your hobby! Every Printing Partner license tier comes with our Patreon miniatures each month.

    WANT TO SEE OUR MODELS PRINTED/PAINTED?

    Join our FACEBOOK Group!!!

    AND

    JOIN US on DISCORD!!!

     

    WANT TO TRY SOME FREE MODELS?

    Check them out on Thingiverse!!!!

     

    Risks and challenges

    Our studio is all in-house and because there are no physical products, there are no manufacturing companies in the mix. This eliminates all the risk of dealing with outside parties and there are no unexpected costs. Our first Campaign was fulfilled without a hitch as we expect this one will be. We are already set to release the core sets upon a successful ending to this project. We are ahead of the game!

    Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ
story_txt:
Hello new backers!Tilescape 2.0 is a modular building system which allows for the ultimate customization of terrain. With our system you will have total control over your structures. There are several unique possibilities for your floors, streets, buildings (inner and outer walls), accessories, and roofs.~ Intuitive/fast building single piece tile system  ~ Modular vertical walls insert-able walls/posts/columns~ Insert-able doors and windows~ Insert-able accessories and decorations (curtains, traps, etc)Gothic City is the newest completely customizable terrain project from Rocket Pig Games. We provide you with the .stl files and you bring them to life on your 3D printer. It utilizes our Tilescape 2.0 building system which features totally modular building components from the ground up! ~ Universal and Versatile Set will work well with many types of gaming!   (Call of Cthulhu, Iron Kingdoms/WarmaHordes, Malifaux, DnD, Steampunk, Victorian/Gothic settings, etc)~ The Biggest Lovecraftian/Gothic horror monster miniatures ever made!~ The most complex roof system available anywhere!~ Make unique buildings in any shape and size!~ Only modular system that has authentic medieval overhanging building   floors.~ The Gothic City Streets Core set also makes an a very good Dungeon tile-set.~ Gothic City supplies everything you need to create a full medieval or   Industrial Fantasy city!~ Our unique and varied wooden floor planks, whimsical stone alleys, and brick streets can be used in their traditional way or as building interior floors, pathways, or balcony flooring.Gothic City Buildings & StreetsLimitless options for building shapes, types, and sizes!Make amazing streets and ally-ways with unique tiles!Create villages, cities, or forest cabins with our generous selection of stone and wood walls and roads!~ Our modular interior walls are insertable and can be arranged however you see fit and the exterior walls can soar to great heights or expand in any direction. Add dimension to your landscape by making your buildings as tall or as short as you want! Insert-able walls can be configured any way you want!~ Our legendary roofing system allows you to expand your rooftops to create practically any shape roof you can imagine and comes complete with gables, eaves, and dormers!Roof System can be configured in almost any configuration!Some examples of areas to create within Gothic City include:- The warm and welcoming residential district with timber-framed homes, beautiful brick walkways, meandering alleyways, and quaint street lamps. Gothic City Residential Neighborhood- Serene network of bridges to weave throughout your city.Create bridges of any length or shape!- Use your Gothic Streets and Buildings to surround the Mythical Castle! Gothic City Castle parts and Gothic City Buildings parts can be combined to create amazing structures!Create your inner castle anyway you choose with insertable walls and props!Amazing Castle with so many building options!Look at this drawbridge!Enemies still cannot pass!- The charming merchant district with a towering cathedral, stately brick storefronts, display windows, and awnings.(See Add-Ons for Images)- The buzzing industrial sector with grand factories and smokestacks.(See Add-Ons for Images)- And so much more!Gothic City is comprised of THREE CORE SETS. All three sets will be available to download upon release so you can begin printing right away!

story:
HYPERBOREA HOODIE

From North Wind Adventures, the makers of Astonishing Swordsmen & Sorcerers of Hyperborea™, presenting the HYPERBOREA HOODIE! 

This Indiegogo campaign is to fund the creation of a high-quality hooded sweatshirt that features Charles Lang's incredible cover art for the HYPERBOREA adventure module, The Mystery at Port Greely™.  

Wear these frightening threads and be the envy of your gaming peers!

 

Product Details

  • Hanes EcoSmart 50/50 Pullover Hoodie (black)

  • HYPERBOREA logo on front

  • Mystery at Port Greely cover art by Charles Lang on back

 

Campaign Details

 

What we need:

  • $900 to have these hoodies made

What you get:

  • An awesome hoodie featuring the cover art from The Mystery at Port Greely

What it costs:

  • $50

Sizes: 

  • S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL

 

Risks & Challenges

Every crowdfunding project faces potential setbacks that can slow or even halt production. To mitigate the possibility of setbacks, I've taken several steps to ensure a positive outcome: The art has been produced and the apparel company quote is in hand. Once this campaign funds, we will order the sweatshirts and then go straight into fulfillment.

Stretch goals are another concern. Of course, the idea is to create stretch goals that provide incentive for additional funding, but it is easy to fall into the trap of dreaming up stretch goals that are difficult, costly, and/or time-consuming to produce. To this end, I've come up with a few modest, reasonable stretch goals, which we will post if the campaign exceeds expectations. 

This is our NINTH crowdfunding campaign. Pledge with confidence! :) 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share the campaign at Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.
  • Share the campaign at your favorite gaming blog or forum
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools

 

 

Final Word

This project was conceived by my wonderful daughter Skye (age 13). Skye works for dad shrink-wrapping adventure modules, packaging and shipping, folding T-shirts, and so forth. She's also been doing more creative work of late, including the coloration of the back cover of The Trouble at Loch Jineeva, a 1e adventure module that I worked on with Luke Gygax, and some illustration work. Skye came up with the concept for this hoodie on her own, presenting a series of sketches to me, and also working on the graphics presentation at CustomInk. I thought the idea was great, so here we are launching the project! Congrats to Skye for an awesome design!
